175/*
176================
177UpdateGuiParms
178================
179*/
180void UpdateGuiParms( idUserInterface *gui, const idDict *args ) {
181 if ( gui == NULL || args == NULL ) {
182 return;
183 }
184 const idKeyValue *kv = args->MatchPrefix( "gui_parm", NULL );
185 while( kv ) {
186 gui->SetStateString( kv->GetKey(), kv->GetValue() );
187 kv = args->MatchPrefix( "gui_parm", kv );
188 }
189 gui->SetStateBool( "noninteractive", args->GetBool( "gui_noninteractive" ) ) ;
190 gui->StateChanged( gameLocal.time );
191}
192
193/*
194================
195AddRenderGui
196================
197*/
198void AddRenderGui( const char *name, idUserInterface **gui, const idDict *args ) {
199 const idKeyValue *kv = args->MatchPrefix( "gui_parm", NULL );
200 *gui = uiManager->FindGui( name, true, ( kv != NULL ) );
201 UpdateGuiParms( *gui, args );
202}
203
204/*
205================
206idGameEdit::ParseSpawnArgsToRenderEntity
207
208parse the static model parameters
209this is the canonical renderEntity parm parsing,
210which should be used by dmap and the editor
211================
212*/
213void idGameEdit::ParseSpawnArgsToRenderEntity( const idDict *args, renderEntity_t *renderEntity ) {
214 int i;
215 const char *temp;
216 idVec3 color;
217 float angle;
218 const idDeclModelDef *modelDef;
219
220 memset( renderEntity, 0, sizeof( *renderEntity ) );
221
222 temp = args->GetString( "model" );
223
224 modelDef = NULL;
225 if ( temp[0] != '\0' ) {
226 modelDef = static_cast<const idDeclModelDef *>( declManager->FindType( DECL_MODELDEF, temp, false ) );
227 if ( modelDef ) {
228 renderEntity->hModel = modelDef->ModelHandle();
229 }
230 if ( !renderEntity->hModel ) {
231 renderEntity->hModel = renderModelManager->FindModel( temp );
232 }
233 }
234 if ( renderEntity->hModel ) {
235 renderEntity->bounds = renderEntity->hModel->Bounds( renderEntity );
236 } else {
237 renderEntity->bounds.Zero();
238 }
239
240 temp = args->GetString( "skin" );
241 if ( temp[0] != '\0' ) {
242 renderEntity->customSkin = declManager->FindSkin( temp );
243 } else if ( modelDef ) {
244 renderEntity->customSkin = modelDef->GetDefaultSkin();
245 }
246
247 temp = args->GetString( "shader" );
248 if ( temp[0] != '\0' ) {
249 renderEntity->customShader = declManager->FindMaterial( temp );
250 }
251
252 args->GetVector( "origin", "0 0 0", renderEntity->origin );
253
254 // get the rotation matrix in either full form, or single angle form
255 if ( !args->GetMatrix( "rotation", "1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1", renderEntity->axis ) ) {
256 angle = args->GetFloat( "angle" );
257 if ( angle != 0.0f ) {
258 renderEntity->axis = idAngles( 0.0f, angle, 0.0f ).ToMat3();
259 } else {
260 renderEntity->axis.Identity();
261 }
262 }
263
264 renderEntity->referenceSound = NULL;
265
266 // get shader parms
267 args->GetVector( "_color", "1 1 1", color );
268 renderEntity->shaderParms[ SHADERPARM_RED ] = color[0];
269 renderEntity->shaderParms[ SHADERPARM_GREEN ] = color[1];
270 renderEntity->shaderParms[ SHADERPARM_BLUE ] = color[2];
271 renderEntity->shaderParms[ 3 ] = args->GetFloat( "shaderParm3", "1" );
272 renderEntity->shaderParms[ 4 ] = args->GetFloat( "shaderParm4", "0" );
273 renderEntity->shaderParms[ 5 ] = args->GetFloat( "shaderParm5", "0" );
274 renderEntity->shaderParms[ 6 ] = args->GetFloat( "shaderParm6", "0" );
275 renderEntity->shaderParms[ 7 ] = args->GetFloat( "shaderParm7", "0" );
276 renderEntity->shaderParms[ 8 ] = args->GetFloat( "shaderParm8", "0" );
277 renderEntity->shaderParms[ 9 ] = args->GetFloat( "shaderParm9", "0" );
278 renderEntity->shaderParms[ 10 ] = args->GetFloat( "shaderParm10", "0" );
279 renderEntity->shaderParms[ 11 ] = args->GetFloat( "shaderParm11", "0" );
280
281 // check noDynamicInteractions flag
282 renderEntity->noDynamicInteractions = args->GetBool( "noDynamicInteractions" );
283
284 // check noshadows flag
285 renderEntity->noShadow = args->GetBool( "noshadows" );
286
287 // check noselfshadows flag
288 renderEntity->noSelfShadow = args->GetBool( "noselfshadows" );
289
290 // init any guis, including entity-specific states
291 for( i = 0; i < MAX_RENDERENTITY_GUI; i++ ) {
292 temp = args->GetString( i == 0 ? "gui" : va( "gui%d", i + 1 ) );
293 if ( temp[ 0 ] != '\0' ) {
294 AddRenderGui( temp, &renderEntity->gui[ i ], args );
295 }
296 }
297}
298
299/*
300================
301idGameEdit::ParseSpawnArgsToRefSound
302
303parse the sound parameters
304this is the canonical refSound parm parsing,
305which should be used by dmap and the editor
306================
307*/
308void idGameEdit::ParseSpawnArgsToRefSound( const idDict *args, refSound_t *refSound ) {
309 const char *temp;
310
311 memset( refSound, 0, sizeof( *refSound ) );
312
313 refSound->parms.minDistance = args->GetFloat( "s_mindistance" );
314 refSound->parms.maxDistance = args->GetFloat( "s_maxdistance" );
315 refSound->parms.volume = args->GetFloat( "s_volume" );
316 refSound->parms.shakes = args->GetFloat( "s_shakes" );
317
318 args->GetVector( "origin", "0 0 0", refSound->origin );
319
320 refSound->referenceSound = NULL;
321
322 // if a diversity is not specified, every sound start will make
323 // a random one. Specifying diversity is usefull to make multiple
324 // lights all share the same buzz sound offset, for instance.
325 refSound->diversity = args->GetFloat( "s_diversity", "-1" );
326 refSound->waitfortrigger = args->GetBool( "s_waitfortrigger" );
327
328 if ( args->GetBool( "s_omni" ) ) {
329 refSound->parms.soundShaderFlags |= SSF_OMNIDIRECTIONAL;
330 }
331 if ( args->GetBool( "s_looping" ) ) {
332 refSound->parms.soundShaderFlags |= SSF_LOOPING;
333 }
334 if ( args->GetBool( "s_occlusion" ) ) {
335 refSound->parms.soundShaderFlags |= SSF_NO_OCCLUSION;
336 }
337 if ( args->GetBool( "s_global" ) ) {
338 refSound->parms.soundShaderFlags |= SSF_GLOBAL;
339 }
340 if ( args->GetBool( "s_unclamped" ) ) {
341 refSound->parms.soundShaderFlags |= SSF_UNCLAMPED;
342 }
343 refSound->parms.soundClass = args->GetInt( "s_soundClass" );
344
345 temp = args->GetString( "s_shader" );
346 if ( temp[0] != '\0' ) {
347 refSound->shader = declManager->FindSound( temp );
348 }
349}
350
351/*
352===============
353idEntity::UpdateChangeableSpawnArgs
354
355Any key val pair that might change during the course of the game ( via a gui or whatever )
356should be initialize here so a gui or other trigger can change something and have it updated
357properly. An optional source may be provided if the values reside in an outside dictionary and
358first need copied over to spawnArgs
359===============
360*/
361void idEntity::UpdateChangeableSpawnArgs( const idDict *source ) {
362 int i;
363 const char *target;
364
365 if ( !source ) {
366 source = &spawnArgs;
367 }
368 cameraTarget = NULL;
369 target = source->GetString( "cameraTarget" );
370 if ( target && target[0] ) {
371 // update the camera taget
372 PostEventMS( &EV_UpdateCameraTarget, 0 );
373 }
374
375 for ( i = 0; i < MAX_RENDERENTITY_GUI; i++ ) {
376 UpdateGuiParms( renderEntity.gui[ i ], source );
377 }
378}
379
380/*
381================
382idEntity::idEntity
383================
384*/
385idEntity::idEntity() {
386
387 entityNumber = ENTITYNUM_NONE;
388 entityDefNumber = -1;
389
390 spawnNode.SetOwner( this );
391 activeNode.SetOwner( this );
392
393 snapshotNode.SetOwner( this );
394 snapshotSequence = -1;
395 snapshotBits = 0;
396
397 thinkFlags = 0;
398 dormantStart = 0;
399 cinematic = false;
400 renderView = NULL;
401 cameraTarget = NULL;
402 health = 0;
403
404 physics = NULL;
405 bindMaster = NULL;
406 bindJoint = INVALID_JOINT;
407 bindBody = -1;
408 teamMaster = NULL;
409 teamChain = NULL;
410 signals = NULL;
411
412 memset( PVSAreas, 0, sizeof( PVSAreas ) );
413 numPVSAreas = -1;
414
415 memset( &fl, 0, sizeof( fl ) );
416 fl.neverDormant = true; // most entities never go dormant
417
418 memset( &renderEntity, 0, sizeof( renderEntity ) );
419 modelDefHandle = -1;
420 memset( &refSound, 0, sizeof( refSound ) );
421
422 mpGUIState = -1;
423}
424
425/*
426================
427idEntity::FixupLocalizedStrings
428================
429*/
430void idEntity::FixupLocalizedStrings() {
431 for ( int i = 0; i < spawnArgs.GetNumKeyVals(); i++ ) {
432 const idKeyValue *kv = spawnArgs.GetKeyVal( i );
433 if ( idStr::Cmpn( kv->GetValue(), STRTABLE_ID, STRTABLE_ID_LENGTH ) == 0 ){
434 spawnArgs.Set( kv->GetKey(), common->GetLanguageDict()->GetString( kv->GetValue() ) );
435 }
436 }
437}
438
439/*
440================
441idEntity::Spawn
442================
443*/
444void idEntity::Spawn( void ) {
445 int i;
446 const char *temp;
447 idVec3 origin;
448 idMat3 axis;
449 const idKeyValue *networkSync;
450 const char *classname;
451 const char *scriptObjectName;
452
453 gameLocal.RegisterEntity( this );
454
455 spawnArgs.GetString( "classname", NULL, &classname );
456 const idDeclEntityDef *def = gameLocal.FindEntityDef( classname, false );
457 if ( def ) {
458 entityDefNumber = def->Index();
459 }
460
461 FixupLocalizedStrings();
462
463 // parse static models the same way the editor display does
464 gameEdit->ParseSpawnArgsToRenderEntity( &spawnArgs, &renderEntity );
465
466 renderEntity.entityNum = entityNumber;
467
468 // go dormant within 5 frames so that when the map starts most monsters are dormant
469 dormantStart = gameLocal.time - DELAY_DORMANT_TIME + gameLocal.msec * 5;
470
471 origin = renderEntity.origin;
472 axis = renderEntity.axis;
473
474 // do the audio parsing the same way dmap and the editor do
475 gameEdit->ParseSpawnArgsToRefSound( &spawnArgs, &refSound );
476
477 // only play SCHANNEL_PRIVATE when sndworld->PlaceListener() is called with this listenerId
478 // don't spatialize sounds from the same entity
479 refSound.listenerId = entityNumber + 1;
480
481 cameraTarget = NULL;
482 temp = spawnArgs.GetString( "cameraTarget" );
483 if ( temp && temp[0] ) {
484 // update the camera taget
485 PostEventMS( &EV_UpdateCameraTarget, 0 );
486 }
487
488 for ( i = 0; i < MAX_RENDERENTITY_GUI; i++ ) {
489 UpdateGuiParms( renderEntity.gui[ i ], &spawnArgs );
490 }
491
492 fl.solidForTeam = spawnArgs.GetBool( "solidForTeam", "0" );
493 fl.neverDormant = spawnArgs.GetBool( "neverDormant", "0" );
494 fl.hidden = spawnArgs.GetBool( "hide", "0" );
495 if ( fl.hidden ) {
496 // make sure we're hidden, since a spawn function might not set it up right
497 PostEventMS( &EV_Hide, 0 );
498 }
499 cinematic = spawnArgs.GetBool( "cinematic", "0" );
500
501 networkSync = spawnArgs.FindKey( "networkSync" );
502 if ( networkSync ) {
503 fl.networkSync = ( atoi( networkSync->GetValue() ) != 0 );
504 }
505
506#if 0
507 if ( !gameLocal.isClient ) {
508 // common->DPrintf( "NET: DBG %s - %s is synced: %s\n", spawnArgs.GetString( "classname", "" ), GetType()->classname, fl.networkSync ? "true" : "false" );
509 if ( spawnArgs.GetString( "classname", "" )[ 0 ] == '\0' && !fl.networkSync ) {
510 common->DPrintf( "NET: WRN %s entity, no classname, and no networkSync?\n", GetType()->classname );
511 }
512 }
513#endif
514
515 // every object will have a unique name
516 temp = spawnArgs.GetString( "name", va( "%s_%s_%d", GetClassname(), spawnArgs.GetString( "classname" ), entityNumber ) );
517 SetName( temp );
518
519 // if we have targets, wait until all entities are spawned to get them
520 if ( spawnArgs.MatchPrefix( "target" ) || spawnArgs.MatchPrefix( "guiTarget" ) ) {
521 if ( gameLocal.GameState() == GAMESTATE_STARTUP ) {
522 PostEventMS( &EV_FindTargets, 0 );
523 } else {
524 // not during spawn, so it's ok to get the targets
525 FindTargets();
526 }
527 }
528
529 health = spawnArgs.GetInt( "health" );
530
531 InitDefaultPhysics( origin, axis );
532
533 SetOrigin( origin );
534 SetAxis( axis );
535
536 temp = spawnArgs.GetString( "model" );
537 if ( temp && *temp ) {
538 SetModel( temp );
539 }
540
541 if ( spawnArgs.GetString( "bind", "", &temp ) ) {
542 PostEventMS( &EV_SpawnBind, 0 );
543 }
544
545 // auto-start a sound on the entity
546 if ( refSound.shader && !refSound.waitfortrigger ) {
547 StartSoundShader( refSound.shader, SND_CHANNEL_ANY, 0, false, NULL );
548 }
549
550 // setup script object
551 if ( ShouldConstructScriptObjectAtSpawn() && spawnArgs.GetString( "scriptobject", NULL, &scriptObjectName ) ) {
552 if ( !scriptObject.SetType( scriptObjectName ) ) {
553 gameLocal.Error( "Script object '%s' not found on entity '%s'.", scriptObjectName, name.c_str() );
554 }
555
556 ConstructScriptObject();
557 }
558}
559
560/*
561================
562idEntity::~idEntity
563================
564*/
565idEntity::~idEntity( void ) {
566
567 if ( gameLocal.GameState() != GAMESTATE_SHUTDOWN && !gameLocal.isClient && fl.networkSync && entityNumber >= MAX_CLIENTS ) {
568 idBitMsg msg;
569 byte msgBuf[ MAX_GAME_MESSAGE_SIZE ];
570
571 msg.Init( msgBuf, sizeof( msgBuf ) );
572 msg.WriteByte( GAME_RELIABLE_MESSAGE_DELETE_ENT );
573 msg.WriteBits( gameLocal.GetSpawnId( this ), 32 );
574 networkSystem->ServerSendReliableMessage( -1, msg );
575 }
576
577 DeconstructScriptObject();
578 scriptObject.Free();
579
580 if ( thinkFlags ) {
581 BecomeInactive( thinkFlags );
582 }
583 activeNode.Remove();
584
585 Signal( SIG_REMOVED );
586
587 // we have to set back the default physics object before unbinding because the entity
588 // specific physics object might be an entity variable and as such could already be destroyed.
589 SetPhysics( NULL );
590
591 // remove any entities that are bound to me
592 RemoveBinds();
593
594 // unbind from master
595 Unbind();
596 QuitTeam();
597
598 gameLocal.RemoveEntityFromHash( name.c_str(), this );
599
600 delete renderView;
601 renderView = NULL;
602
603 delete signals;
604 signals = NULL;
605
606 FreeModelDef();
607 FreeSoundEmitter( false );
608
609 gameLocal.UnregisterEntity( this );
610}
611
612/*
613================
614idEntity::Save
615================
616*/
617void idEntity::Save( idSaveGame *savefile ) const {
618 int i, j;
619
620 savefile->WriteInt( entityNumber );
621 savefile->WriteInt( entityDefNumber );
622
623 // spawnNode and activeNode are restored by gameLocal
624
625 savefile->WriteInt( snapshotSequence );
626 savefile->WriteInt( snapshotBits );
627
628 savefile->WriteDict( &spawnArgs );
629 savefile->WriteString( name );
630 scriptObject.Save( savefile );
631
632 savefile->WriteInt( thinkFlags );
633 savefile->WriteInt( dormantStart );
634 savefile->WriteBool( cinematic );
635
636 savefile->WriteObject( cameraTarget );
637
638 savefile->WriteInt( health );
639
640 savefile->WriteInt( targets.Num() );
641 for( i = 0; i < targets.Num(); i++ ) {
642 targets[ i ].Save( savefile );
643 }
644
645 entityFlags_s flags = fl;
646 LittleBitField( &flags, sizeof( flags ) );
647 savefile->Write( &flags, sizeof( flags ) );
648
649 savefile->WriteRenderEntity( renderEntity );
650 savefile->WriteInt( modelDefHandle );
651 savefile->WriteRefSound( refSound );
652
653 savefile->WriteObject( bindMaster );
654 savefile->WriteJoint( bindJoint );
655 savefile->WriteInt( bindBody );
656 savefile->WriteObject( teamMaster );
657 savefile->WriteObject( teamChain );
658
659 savefile->WriteStaticObject( defaultPhysicsObj );
660
661 savefile->WriteInt( numPVSAreas );
662 for( i = 0; i < MAX_PVS_AREAS; i++ ) {
663 savefile->WriteInt( PVSAreas[ i ] );
664 }
665
666 if ( !signals ) {
667 savefile->WriteBool( false );
668 } else {
669 savefile->WriteBool( true );
670 for( i = 0; i < NUM_SIGNALS; i++ ) {
671 savefile->WriteInt( signals->signal[ i ].Num() );
672 for( j = 0; j < signals->signal[ i ].Num(); j++ ) {
673 savefile->WriteInt( signals->signal[ i ][ j ].threadnum );
674 savefile->WriteString( signals->signal[ i ][ j ].function->Name() );
675 }
676 }
677 }
678
679 savefile->WriteInt( mpGUIState );
680}
681
682/*
683================
684idEntity::Restore
685================
686*/
687void idEntity::Restore( idRestoreGame *savefile ) {
688 int i, j;
689 int num;
690 idStr funcname;
691
692 savefile->ReadInt( entityNumber );
693 savefile->ReadInt( entityDefNumber );
694
695 // spawnNode and activeNode are restored by gameLocal
696
697 savefile->ReadInt( snapshotSequence );
698 savefile->ReadInt( snapshotBits );
699
700 savefile->ReadDict( &spawnArgs );
701 savefile->ReadString( name );
702 SetName( name );
703
704 scriptObject.Restore( savefile );
705
706 savefile->ReadInt( thinkFlags );
707 savefile->ReadInt( dormantStart );
708 savefile->ReadBool( cinematic );
709
710 savefile->ReadObject( reinterpret_cast<idClass *&>( cameraTarget ) );
711
712 savefile->ReadInt( health );
713
714 targets.Clear();
715 savefile->ReadInt( num );
716 targets.SetNum( num );
717 for( i = 0; i < num; i++ ) {
718 targets[ i ].Restore( savefile );
719 }
720
721 savefile->Read( &fl, sizeof( fl ) );
722 LittleBitField( &fl, sizeof( fl ) );
723
724 savefile->ReadRenderEntity( renderEntity );
725 savefile->ReadInt( modelDefHandle );
726 savefile->ReadRefSound( refSound );
727
728 savefile->ReadObject( reinterpret_cast<idClass *&>( bindMaster ) );
729 savefile->ReadJoint( bindJoint );
730 savefile->ReadInt( bindBody );
731 savefile->ReadObject( reinterpret_cast<idClass *&>( teamMaster ) );
732 savefile->ReadObject( reinterpret_cast<idClass *&>( teamChain ) );
733
734 savefile->ReadStaticObject( defaultPhysicsObj );
735 RestorePhysics( &defaultPhysicsObj );
736
737 savefile->ReadInt( numPVSAreas );
738 for( i = 0; i < MAX_PVS_AREAS; i++ ) {
739 savefile->ReadInt( PVSAreas[ i ] );
740 }
741
742 bool readsignals;
743 savefile->ReadBool( readsignals );
744 if ( readsignals ) {
745 signals = new signalList_t;
746 for( i = 0; i < NUM_SIGNALS; i++ ) {
747 savefile->ReadInt( num );
748 signals->signal[ i ].SetNum( num );
749 for( j = 0; j < num; j++ ) {
750 savefile->ReadInt( signals->signal[ i ][ j ].threadnum );
751 savefile->ReadString( funcname );
752 signals->signal[ i ][ j ].function = gameLocal.program.FindFunction( funcname );
753 if ( !signals->signal[ i ][ j ].function ) {
754 savefile->Error( "Function '%s' not found", funcname.c_str() );
755 }
756 }
757 }
758 }
759
760 savefile->ReadInt( mpGUIState );
761
762 // restore must retrieve modelDefHandle from the renderer
763 if ( modelDefHandle != -1 ) {
764 modelDefHandle = gameRenderWorld->AddEntityDef( &renderEntity );
765 }
766}
767

769================
770idEntity::GetEntityDefName
771================
772*/
773const char * idEntity::GetEntityDefName( void ) const {
774 if ( entityDefNumber < 0 ) {
775 return "*unknown*";
776 }
777 return declManager->DeclByIndex( DECL_ENTITYDEF, entityDefNumber, false )->GetName();
778}

780/*
781================
782idEntity::SetName
783================
784*/
785void idEntity::SetName( const char *newname ) {
786 if ( name.Length() ) {
787 gameLocal.RemoveEntityFromHash( name.c_str(), this );
788 gameLocal.program.SetEntity( name, NULL );
789 }
790
791 name = newname;
792 if ( name.Length() ) {
793 if ( ( name == "NULL" ) || ( name == "null_entity" ) ) {
794 gameLocal.Error( "Cannot name entity '%s'. '%s' is reserved for script.", name.c_str(), name.c_str() );
795 }
796 gameLocal.AddEntityToHash( name.c_str(), this );
797 gameLocal.program.SetEntity( name, this );
798 }
799}

808}

827/*
828================
829idEntity::DoDormantTests
830
831Monsters and other expensive entities that are completely closed
832off from the player can skip all of their work
833================
834*/
835bool idEntity::DoDormantTests( void ) {
836
837 if ( fl.neverDormant ) {
838 return false;
839 }
840
841 // if the monster area is not topologically connected to a player
842 if ( !gameLocal.InPlayerConnectedArea( this ) ) {
843 if ( dormantStart == 0 ) {
844 dormantStart = gameLocal.time;
845 }
846 if ( gameLocal.time - dormantStart < DELAY_DORMANT_TIME ) {
847 // just got closed off, don't go dormant yet
848 return false;
849 }
850 return true;
851 } else {
852 // the monster area is topologically connected to a player, but if
853 // the monster hasn't been woken up before, do the more precise PVS check
854 if ( !fl.hasAwakened ) {
855 if ( !gameLocal.InPlayerPVS( this ) ) {
856 return true; // stay dormant
857 }
858 }
859
860 // wake up
861 dormantStart = 0;
862 fl.hasAwakened = true; // only go dormant when area closed off now, not just out of PVS
863 return false;
864 }
865
866 return false;
867}
868
869/*
870================
871idEntity::CheckDormant
872
873Monsters and other expensive entities that are completely closed
874off from the player can skip all of their work
875================
876*/
877bool idEntity::CheckDormant( void ) {
878 bool dormant;
879
880 dormant = DoDormantTests();
881 if ( dormant && !fl.isDormant ) {
882 fl.isDormant = true;
883 DormantBegin();
884 } else if ( !dormant && fl.isDormant ) {
885 fl.isDormant = false;
886 DormantEnd();
887 }
888
889 return dormant;
890}

900}

903================
904idEntity::DormantEnd
905
906called when entity wakes from being dormant
907================
908*/
909void idEntity::DormantEnd( void ) {
910}

913================
914idEntity::IsActive
915================
916*/
917bool idEntity::IsActive( void ) const {
918 return activeNode.InList();
919}
920
921/*
922================
923idEntity::BecomeActive
924================
925*/
926void idEntity::BecomeActive( int flags ) {
927 if ( ( flags & TH_PHYSICS ) ) {
928 // enable the team master if this entity is part of a physics team
929 if ( teamMaster && teamMaster != this ) {
930 teamMaster->BecomeActive( TH_PHYSICS );
931 } else if ( !( thinkFlags & TH_PHYSICS ) ) {
932 // if this is a pusher
933 if ( physics->IsType( idPhysics_Parametric::Type ) || physics->IsType( idPhysics_Actor::Type ) ) {
934 gameLocal.sortPushers = true;
935 }
936 }
937 }
938
939 int oldFlags = thinkFlags;
940 thinkFlags |= flags;
941 if ( thinkFlags ) {
942 if ( !IsActive() ) {
943 activeNode.AddToEnd( gameLocal.activeEntities );
944 } else if ( !oldFlags ) {
945 // we became inactive this frame, so we have to decrease the count of entities to deactivate
946 gameLocal.numEntitiesToDeactivate--;
947 }
948 }
949}
950
951/*
952================
953idEntity::BecomeInactive
954================
955*/
956void idEntity::BecomeInactive( int flags ) {
957 if ( ( flags & TH_PHYSICS ) ) {
958 // may only disable physics on a team master if no team members are running physics or bound to a joints
959 if ( teamMaster == this ) {
960 for ( idEntity *ent = teamMaster->teamChain; ent; ent = ent->teamChain ) {
961 if ( ( ent->thinkFlags & TH_PHYSICS ) || ( ( ent->bindMaster == this ) && ( ent->bindJoint != INVALID_JOINT ) ) ) {
962 flags &= ~TH_PHYSICS;
963 break;
964 }
965 }
966 }
967 }
968
969 if ( thinkFlags ) {
970 thinkFlags &= ~flags;
971 if ( !thinkFlags && IsActive() ) {
972 gameLocal.numEntitiesToDeactivate++;
973 }
974 }
975
976 if ( ( flags & TH_PHYSICS ) ) {
977 // if this entity has a team master
978 if ( teamMaster && teamMaster != this ) {
979 // if the team master is at rest
980 if ( teamMaster->IsAtRest() ) {
981 teamMaster->BecomeInactive( TH_PHYSICS );
982 }
983 }
984 }
985}

1100
1101 UpdateVisuals();
1102}

1177/*
1178================
1179idEntity::UpdateModelTransform
1180================
1181*/
1182void idEntity::UpdateModelTransform( void ) {
1183 idVec3 origin;
1184 idMat3 axis;
1185
1186 if ( GetPhysicsToVisualTransform( origin, axis ) ) {
1187 renderEntity.axis = axis * GetPhysics()->GetAxis();
1188 renderEntity.origin = GetPhysics()->GetOrigin() + origin * renderEntity.axis;
1189 } else {
1190 renderEntity.axis = GetPhysics()->GetAxis();
1191 renderEntity.origin = GetPhysics()->GetOrigin();
1192 }
1193}
1194
1195/*
1196================
1197idEntity::UpdateModel
1198================
1199*/
1200void idEntity::UpdateModel( void ) {
1201 UpdateModelTransform();
1202
1203 // check if the entity has an MD5 model
1204 idAnimator *animator = GetAnimator();
1205 if ( animator && animator->ModelHandle() ) {
1206 // set the callback to update the joints
1207 renderEntity.callback = idEntity::ModelCallback;
1208 }
1209
1210 // set to invalid number to force an update the next time the PVS areas are retrieved
1211 ClearPVSAreas();
1212
1213 // ensure that we call Present this frame
1214 BecomeActive( TH_UPDATEVISUALS );
1215}
1216
1217/*
1218================
1219idEntity::UpdateVisuals
1220================
1221*/
1222void idEntity::UpdateVisuals( void ) {
1223 UpdateModel();
1224 UpdateSound();
1225}
1226
1227/*
1228================
1229idEntity::UpdatePVSAreas
1230================
1231*/
1232void idEntity::UpdatePVSAreas( void ) {
1233 int localNumPVSAreas, localPVSAreas[32];
1234 idBounds modelAbsBounds;
1235 int i;
1236
1237 modelAbsBounds.FromTransformedBounds( renderEntity.bounds, renderEntity.origin, renderEntity.axis );
1238 localNumPVSAreas = gameLocal.pvs.GetPVSAreas( modelAbsBounds, localPVSAreas, sizeof( localPVSAreas ) / sizeof( localPVSAreas[0] ) );
1239
1240 // FIXME: some particle systems may have huge bounds and end up in many PVS areas
1241 // the first MAX_PVS_AREAS may not be visible to a network client and as a result the particle system may not show up when it should
1242 if ( localNumPVSAreas > MAX_PVS_AREAS ) {
1243 localNumPVSAreas = gameLocal.pvs.GetPVSAreas( idBounds( modelAbsBounds.GetCenter() ).Expand( 64.0f ), localPVSAreas, sizeof( localPVSAreas ) / sizeof( localPVSAreas[0] ) );
1244 }
1245
1246 for ( numPVSAreas = 0; numPVSAreas < MAX_PVS_AREAS && numPVSAreas < localNumPVSAreas; numPVSAreas++ ) {
1247 PVSAreas[numPVSAreas] = localPVSAreas[numPVSAreas];
1248 }
1249
1250 for( i = numPVSAreas; i < MAX_PVS_AREAS; i++ ) {
1251 PVSAreas[ i ] = 0;
1252 }
1253}
1254
1255/*
1256================
1257idEntity::UpdatePVSAreas
1258================
1259*/
1260void idEntity::UpdatePVSAreas( const idVec3 &pos ) {
1261 int i;
1262
1263 numPVSAreas = gameLocal.pvs.GetPVSAreas( idBounds( pos ), PVSAreas, MAX_PVS_AREAS );
1264 i = numPVSAreas;
1265 while ( i < MAX_PVS_AREAS ) {
1266 PVSAreas[ i++ ] = 0;
1267 }
1268}
1269
1270/*
1271================
1272idEntity::GetNumPVSAreas
1273================
1274*/
1275int idEntity::GetNumPVSAreas( void ) {
1276 if ( numPVSAreas < 0 ) {
1277 UpdatePVSAreas();
1278 }
1279 return numPVSAreas;
1280}
1281
1282/*
1283================
1284idEntity::GetPVSAreas
1285================
1286*/
1287const int *idEntity::GetPVSAreas( void ) {
1288 if ( numPVSAreas < 0 ) {
1289 UpdatePVSAreas();
1290 }
1291 return PVSAreas;
1292}

1299void idEntity::ClearPVSAreas( void ) {
1300 numPVSAreas = -1;
1301}

1303/*
1304================
1305idEntity::PhysicsTeamInPVS
1306
1307 FIXME: for networking also return true if any of the entity shadows is in the PVS
1308================
1309*/
1310bool idEntity::PhysicsTeamInPVS( pvsHandle_t pvsHandle ) {
1311 idEntity *part;
1312
1313 if ( teamMaster ) {
1314 for ( part = teamMaster; part; part = part->teamChain ) {
1315 if ( gameLocal.pvs.InCurrentPVS( pvsHandle, part->GetPVSAreas(), part->GetNumPVSAreas() ) ) {
1316 return true;
1317 }
1318 }
1319 } else {
1320 return gameLocal.pvs.InCurrentPVS( pvsHandle, GetPVSAreas(), GetNumPVSAreas() );
1321 }
1322 return false;
1323}
1324
1325/*
1326==============
1327idEntity::ProjectOverlay
1328==============
1329*/
1330void idEntity::ProjectOverlay( const idVec3 &origin, const idVec3 &dir, float size, const char *material ) {
1331 float s, c;
1332 idMat3 axis, axistemp;
1333 idVec3 localOrigin, localAxis[2];
1334 idPlane localPlane[2];
1335
1336 // make sure the entity has a valid model handle
1337 if ( modelDefHandle < 0 ) {
1338 return;
1339 }
1340
1341 // only do this on dynamic md5 models
1342 if ( renderEntity.hModel->IsDynamicModel() != DM_CACHED ) {
1343 return;
1344 }
1345
1346 idMath::SinCos16( gameLocal.random.RandomFloat() * idMath::TWO_PI, s, c );
1347
1348 axis[2] = -dir;
1349 axis[2].NormalVectors( axistemp[0], axistemp[1] );
1350 axis[0] = axistemp[ 0 ] * c + axistemp[ 1 ] * -s;
1351 axis[1] = axistemp[ 0 ] * -s + axistemp[ 1 ] * -c;
1352
1353 renderEntity.axis.ProjectVector( origin - renderEntity.origin, localOrigin );
1354 renderEntity.axis.ProjectVector( axis[0], localAxis[0] );
1355 renderEntity.axis.ProjectVector( axis[1], localAxis[1] );
1356
1357 size = 1.0f / size;
1358 localAxis[0] *= size;
1359 localAxis[1] *= size;
1360
1361 localPlane[0] = localAxis[0];
1362 localPlane[0][3] = -( localOrigin * localAxis[0] ) + 0.5f;
1363
1364 localPlane[1] = localAxis[1];
1365 localPlane[1][3] = -( localOrigin * localAxis[1] ) + 0.5f;
1366
1367 const idMaterial *mtr = declManager->FindMaterial( material );
1368
1369 // project an overlay onto the model
1370 gameRenderWorld->ProjectOverlay( modelDefHandle, localPlane, mtr );
1371
1372 // make sure non-animating models update their overlay
1373 UpdateVisuals();
1374}
1375
1376/*
1377================
1378idEntity::Present
1379
1380Present is called to allow entities to generate refEntities, lights, etc for the renderer.
1381================
1382*/
1383void idEntity::Present( void ) {
1384
1385 if ( !gameLocal.isNewFrame ) {
1386 return;
1387 }
1388
1389 // don't present to the renderer if the entity hasn't changed
1390 if ( !( thinkFlags & TH_UPDATEVISUALS ) ) {
1391 return;
1392 }
1393 BecomeInactive( TH_UPDATEVISUALS );
1394
1395 // camera target for remote render views
1396 if ( cameraTarget && gameLocal.InPlayerPVS( this ) ) {
1397 renderEntity.remoteRenderView = cameraTarget->GetRenderView();
1398 }
1399
1400 // if set to invisible, skip
1401 if ( !renderEntity.hModel || IsHidden() ) {
1402 return;
1403 }
1404
1405 // add to refresh list
1406 if ( modelDefHandle == -1 ) {
1407 modelDefHandle = gameRenderWorld->AddEntityDef( &renderEntity );
1408 } else {
1409 gameRenderWorld->UpdateEntityDef( modelDefHandle, &renderEntity );
1410 }
1411}

1414================
1415idEntity::GetRenderEntity
1416================
1417*/
1418renderEntity_t *idEntity::GetRenderEntity( void ) {
1419 return &renderEntity;
1420}
1421
1422/*
1423================
1424idEntity::GetModelDefHandle
1425================
1426*/
1427int idEntity::GetModelDefHandle( void ) {
1428 return modelDefHandle;
1429}
1430
1431/*
1432================
1433idEntity::UpdateRenderEntity
1434================
1435*/
1436bool idEntity::UpdateRenderEntity( renderEntity_s *renderEntity, const renderView_t *renderView ) {
1437 if ( gameLocal.inCinematic && gameLocal.skipCinematic ) {
1438 return false;
1439 }
1440
1441 idAnimator *animator = GetAnimator();
1442 if ( animator ) {
1443 return animator->CreateFrame( gameLocal.time, false );
1444 }
1445
1446 return false;
1447}

1452
1453 NOTE: may not change the game state whatsoever!
1454================
1455*/
1456bool idEntity::ModelCallback( renderEntity_s *renderEntity, const renderView_t *renderView ) {
1457 idEntity *ent;
1458

1462 }

1478/*
1479=============
1480idEntity::GetRenderView
1481
1482This is used by remote camera views to look from an entity
1483=============
1484*/
1485renderView_t *idEntity::GetRenderView( void ) {
1486 if ( !renderView ) {
1487 renderView = new renderView_t;
1488 }
1489 memset( renderView, 0, sizeof( *renderView ) );
1490
1491 renderView->vieworg = GetPhysics()->GetOrigin();
1492 renderView->fov_x = 120;
1493 renderView->fov_y = 120;
1494 renderView->viewaxis = GetPhysics()->GetAxis();
1495
1496 // copy global shader parms
1497 for( int i = 0; i < MAX_GLOBAL_SHADER_PARMS; i++ ) {
1498 renderView->shaderParms[ i ] = gameLocal.globalShaderParms[ i ];
1499 }
1500
1501 renderView->globalMaterial = gameLocal.GetGlobalMaterial();
1502
1503 renderView->time = gameLocal.time;
1504
1505 return renderView;
1506}

1522 return true;
1523}
1524
1525/*
1526================
1527idEntity::StartSound
1528================
1529*/
1530bool idEntity::StartSound( const char *soundName, const s_channelType channel, int soundShaderFlags, bool broadcast, int *length ) {
1531 const idSoundShader *shader;
1532 const char *sound;
1533
1534 if ( length ) {
1535 *length = 0;
1536 }
1537
1538 // we should ALWAYS be playing sounds from the def.
1539 // hardcoded sounds MUST be avoided at all times because they won't get precached.
1540 assert( idStr::Icmpn( soundName, "snd_", 4 ) == 0 );
1541
1542 if ( !spawnArgs.GetString( soundName, "", &sound ) ) {
1543 return false;
1544 }
1545
1546 if ( sound[0] == '\0' ) {
1547 return false;
1548 }
1549
1550 if ( !gameLocal.isNewFrame ) {
1551 // don't play the sound, but don't report an error
1552 return true;
1553 }
1554
1555 shader = declManager->FindSound( sound );
1556 return StartSoundShader( shader, channel, soundShaderFlags, broadcast, length );
1557}
1558
1559/*
1560================
1561idEntity::StartSoundShader
1562================
1563*/
1564bool idEntity::StartSoundShader( const idSoundShader *shader, const s_channelType channel, int soundShaderFlags, bool broadcast, int *length ) {
1565 float diversity;
1566 int len;
1567
1568 if ( length ) {
1569 *length = 0;
1570 }
1571
1572 if ( !shader ) {
1573 return false;
1574 }
1575
1576 if ( !gameLocal.isNewFrame ) {
1577 return true;
1578 }
1579
1580 if ( gameLocal.isServer && broadcast ) {
1581 idBitMsg msg;
1582 byte msgBuf[MAX_EVENT_PARAM_SIZE];
1583
1584 msg.Init( msgBuf, sizeof( msgBuf ) );
1585 msg.BeginWriting();
1586 msg.WriteLong( gameLocal.ServerRemapDecl( -1, DECL_SOUND, shader->Index() ) );
1587 msg.WriteByte( channel );
1588 ServerSendEvent( EVENT_STARTSOUNDSHADER, &msg, false, -1 );
1589 }
1590
1591 // set a random value for diversity unless one was parsed from the entity
1592 if ( refSound.diversity < 0.0f ) {
1593 diversity = gameLocal.random.RandomFloat();
1594 } else {
1595 diversity = refSound.diversity;
1596 }
1597
1598 // if we don't have a soundEmitter allocated yet, get one now
1599 if ( !refSound.referenceSound ) {
1600 refSound.referenceSound = gameSoundWorld->AllocSoundEmitter();
1601 }
1602
1603 UpdateSound();
1604
1605 len = refSound.referenceSound->StartSound( shader, channel, diversity, soundShaderFlags );
1606 if ( length ) {
1607 *length = len;
1608 }
1609
1610 // set reference to the sound for shader synced effects
1611 renderEntity.referenceSound = refSound.referenceSound;
1612
1613 return true;
1614}
1615
1616/*
1617================
1618idEntity::StopSound
1619================
1620*/
1621void idEntity::StopSound( const s_channelType channel, bool broadcast ) {
1622 if ( !gameLocal.isNewFrame ) {
1623 return;
1624 }
1625
1626 if ( gameLocal.isServer && broadcast ) {
1627 idBitMsg msg;
1628 byte msgBuf[MAX_EVENT_PARAM_SIZE];
1629
1630 msg.Init( msgBuf, sizeof( msgBuf ) );
1631 msg.BeginWriting();
1632 msg.WriteByte( channel );
1633 ServerSendEvent( EVENT_STOPSOUNDSHADER, &msg, false, -1 );
1634 }
1635
1636 if ( refSound.referenceSound ) {
1637 refSound.referenceSound->StopSound( channel );
1638 }
1639}

1648void idEntity::SetSoundVolume( float volume ) {

1650}

1652/*
1653================
1654idEntity::UpdateSound
1655================
1656*/
1657void idEntity::UpdateSound( void ) {
1658 if ( refSound.referenceSound ) {
1659 idVec3 origin;
1660 idMat3 axis;
1661
1662 if ( GetPhysicsToSoundTransform( origin, axis ) ) {
1663 refSound.origin = GetPhysics()->GetOrigin() + origin * axis;
1664 } else {
1665 refSound.origin = GetPhysics()->GetOrigin();
1666 }
1667
1668 refSound.referenceSound->UpdateEmitter( refSound.origin, refSound.listenerId, &refSound.parms );
1669 }
1670}

1740/*
1741================
1742idEntity::InitBind
1743================
1744*/
1745bool idEntity::InitBind( idEntity *master ) {
1746
1747 if ( master == this ) {
1748 gameLocal.Error( "Tried to bind an object to itself." );
1749 return false;
1750 }
1751
1752 if ( this == gameLocal.world ) {
1753 gameLocal.Error( "Tried to bind world to another entity" );
1754 return false;
1755 }
1756
1757 // unbind myself from my master
1758 Unbind();
1759
1760 // add any bind constraints to an articulated figure
1761 if ( master && IsType( idAFEntity_Base::Type ) ) {
1762 static_cast<idAFEntity_Base *>(this)->AddBindConstraints();
1763 }
1764
1765 if ( !master || master == gameLocal.world ) {
1766 // this can happen in scripts, so safely exit out.
1767 return false;
1768 }
1769
1770 return true;
1771}
1772
1773/*
1774================
1775idEntity::FinishBind
1776================
1777*/
1778void idEntity::FinishBind( void ) {
1779
1780 // set the master on the physics object
1781 physics->SetMaster( bindMaster, fl.bindOrientated );
1782
1783 // We are now separated from our previous team and are either
1784 // an individual, or have a team of our own. Now we can join
1785 // the new bindMaster's team. Bindmaster must be set before
1786 // joining the team, or we will be placed in the wrong position
1787 // on the team.
1788 JoinTeam( bindMaster );
1789
1790 // if our bindMaster is enabled during a cinematic, we must be, too
1791 cinematic = bindMaster->cinematic;
1792
1793 // make sure the team master is active so that physics get run
1794 teamMaster->BecomeActive( TH_PHYSICS );
1795}
1796
1797/*
1798================
1799idEntity::Bind
1800
1801 bind relative to the visual position of the master
1802================
1803*/
1804void idEntity::Bind( idEntity *master, bool orientated ) {
1805
1806 if ( !InitBind( master ) ) {
1807 return;
1808 }
1809
1810 PreBind();
1811
1812 bindJoint = INVALID_JOINT;
1813 bindBody = -1;
1814 bindMaster = master;
1815 fl.bindOrientated = orientated;
1816
1817 FinishBind();
1818
1819 PostBind( );
1820}
1821
1822/*
1823================
1824idEntity::BindToJoint
1825
1826 bind relative to a joint of the md5 model used by the master
1827================
1828*/
1829void idEntity::BindToJoint( idEntity *master, const char *jointname, bool orientated ) {
1830 jointHandle_t jointnum;
1831 idAnimator *masterAnimator;
1832
1833 if ( !InitBind( master ) ) {
1834 return;
1835 }
1836
1837 masterAnimator = master->GetAnimator();
1838 if ( !masterAnimator ) {
1839 gameLocal.Warning( "idEntity::BindToJoint: entity '%s' cannot support skeletal models.", master->GetName() );
1840 return;
1841 }
1842
1843 jointnum = masterAnimator->GetJointHandle( jointname );
1844 if ( jointnum == INVALID_JOINT ) {
1845 gameLocal.Warning( "idEntity::BindToJoint: joint '%s' not found on entity '%s'.", jointname, master->GetName() );
1846 }
1847
1848 PreBind();
1849
1850 bindJoint = jointnum;
1851 bindBody = -1;
1852 bindMaster = master;
1853 fl.bindOrientated = orientated;
1854
1855 FinishBind();
1856
1857 PostBind();
1858}

1900 }

1903

1913
1914/*
1915================
1916idEntity::Unbind
1917================
1918*/
1919void idEntity::Unbind( void ) {
1920 idEntity * prev;
1921 idEntity * next;
1922 idEntity * last;
1923 idEntity * ent;
1924
1925 // remove any bind constraints from an articulated figure
1926 if ( IsType( idAFEntity_Base::Type ) ) {
1927 static_cast<idAFEntity_Base *>(this)->RemoveBindConstraints();
1928 }
1929
1930 if ( !bindMaster ) {
1931 return;
1932 }
1933
1934 if ( !teamMaster ) {
1935 // Teammaster already has been freed
1936 bindMaster = NULL;
1937 return;
1938 }
1939
1940 PreUnbind();
1941
1942 if ( physics ) {
1943 physics->SetMaster( NULL, fl.bindOrientated );
1944 }
1945
1946 // We're still part of a team, so that means I have to extricate myself
1947 // and any entities that are bound to me from the old team.
1948 // Find the node previous to me in the team
1949 prev = teamMaster;
1950 for( ent = teamMaster->teamChain; ent && ( ent != this ); ent = ent->teamChain ) {
1951 prev = ent;
1952 }
1953
1954 assert( ent == this ); // If ent is not pointing to this, then something is very wrong.
1955
1956 // Find the last node in my team that is bound to me.
1957 // Also find the first node not bound to me, if one exists.
1958 last = this;
1959 for( next = teamChain; next != NULL; next = next->teamChain ) {
1960 if ( !next->IsBoundTo( this ) ) {
1961 break;
1962 }
1963
1964 // Tell them I'm now the teamMaster
1965 next->teamMaster = this;
1966 last = next;
1967 }
1968
1969 // disconnect the last member of our team from the old team
1970 last->teamChain = NULL;
1971
1972 // connect up the previous member of the old team to the node that
1973 // follow the last node bound to me (if one exists).
1974 if ( teamMaster != this ) {
1975 prev->teamChain = next;
1976 if ( !next && ( teamMaster == prev ) ) {
1977 prev->teamMaster = NULL;
1978 }
1979 } else if ( next ) {
1980 // If we were the teamMaster, then the nodes that were not bound to me are now
1981 // a disconnected chain. Make them into their own team.
1982 for( ent = next; ent->teamChain != NULL; ent = ent->teamChain ) {
1983 ent->teamMaster = next;
1984 }
1985 next->teamMaster = next;
1986 }
1987
1988 // If we don't have anyone on our team, then clear the team variables.
1989 if ( teamChain ) {
1990 // make myself my own team
1991 teamMaster = this;
1992 } else {
1993 // no longer a team
1994 teamMaster = NULL;
1995 }
1996
1997 bindJoint = INVALID_JOINT;
1998 bindBody = -1;
1999 bindMaster = NULL;
2000
2001 PostUnbind();
2002}
2003
2004/*
2005================
2006idEntity::RemoveBinds
2007================
2008*/
2009void idEntity::RemoveBinds( void ) {
2010 idEntity *ent;
2011 idEntity *next;
2012
2013 for( ent = teamChain; ent != NULL; ent = next ) {
2014 next = ent->teamChain;
2015 if ( ent->bindMaster == this ) {
2016 ent->Unbind();
2017 ent->PostEventMS( &EV_Remove, 0 );
2018 next = teamChain;
2019 }
2020 }
2021}

2103idEntity::ConvertLocalToWorldTransform
2104=====================
2105*/
2106void idEntity::ConvertLocalToWorldTransform( idVec3 &offset, idMat3 &axis ) {
2107 UpdateModelTransform();
2108
2109 offset = renderEntity.origin + offset * renderEntity.axis;
2110 axis *= renderEntity.axis;
2111}

2113/*
2114================
2115idEntity::GetLocalVector
2116
2117Takes a vector in worldspace and transforms it into the parent
2118object's localspace.
2119
2120Note: Does not take origin into acount. Use getLocalCoordinate to
2121convert coordinates.
2122================
2123*/
2124idVec3 idEntity::GetLocalVector( const idVec3 &vec ) const {
2125 idVec3 pos;
2126
2127 if ( !bindMaster ) {
2128 return vec;
2129 }
2130
2131 idVec3 masterOrigin;
2132 idMat3 masterAxis;
2133
2134 GetMasterPosition( masterOrigin, masterAxis );
2135 masterAxis.ProjectVector( vec, pos );
2136
2137 return pos;
2138}
2139

2141================
2142idEntity::GetLocalCoordinates
2143
2144Takes a vector in world coordinates and transforms it into the parent
2145object's local coordinates.
2146================
2147*/
2148idVec3 idEntity::GetLocalCoordinates( const idVec3 &vec ) const {
2149 idVec3 pos;
2150
2151 if ( !bindMaster ) {
2152 return vec;
2153 }
2154
2155 idVec3 masterOrigin;
2156 idMat3 masterAxis;
2157
2158 GetMasterPosition( masterOrigin, masterAxis );
2159 masterAxis.ProjectVector( vec - masterOrigin, pos );
2160
2161 return pos;
2162}

2199idVec3 idEntity::GetWorldCoordinates( const idVec3 &vec ) const {

2210 masterAxis.UnprojectVector( vec, pos );
2211 pos += masterOrigin;

2216/*
2217================
2218idEntity::GetMasterPosition
2219================
2220*/
2221bool idEntity::GetMasterPosition( idVec3 &masterOrigin, idMat3 &masterAxis ) const {
2222 idVec3 localOrigin;
2223 idMat3 localAxis;
2224 idAnimator *masterAnimator;
2225
2226 if ( bindMaster ) {
2227 // if bound to a joint of an animated model
2228 if ( bindJoint != INVALID_JOINT ) {
2229 masterAnimator = bindMaster->GetAnimator();
2230 if ( !masterAnimator ) {
2231 masterOrigin = vec3_origin;
2232 masterAxis = mat3_identity;
2233 return false;
2234 } else {
2235 masterAnimator->GetJointTransform( bindJoint, gameLocal.time, masterOrigin, masterAxis );
2236 masterAxis *= bindMaster->renderEntity.axis;
2237 masterOrigin = bindMaster->renderEntity.origin + masterOrigin * bindMaster->renderEntity.axis;
2238 }
2239 } else if ( bindBody >= 0 && bindMaster->GetPhysics() ) {
2240 masterOrigin = bindMaster->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin( bindBody );
2241 masterAxis = bindMaster->GetPhysics()->GetAxis( bindBody );
2242 } else {
2243 masterOrigin = bindMaster->renderEntity.origin;
2244 masterAxis = bindMaster->renderEntity.axis;
2245 }
2246 return true;
2247 } else {
2248 masterOrigin = vec3_origin;
2249 masterAxis = mat3_identity;
2250 return false;
2251 }
2252}
2253
2254/*
2255================
2256idEntity::GetWorldVelocities
2257================
2258*/
2259void idEntity::GetWorldVelocities( idVec3 &linearVelocity, idVec3 &angularVelocity ) const {
2260
2261 linearVelocity = physics->GetLinearVelocity();
2262 angularVelocity = physics->GetAngularVelocity();
2263
2264 if ( bindMaster ) {
2265 idVec3 masterOrigin, masterLinearVelocity, masterAngularVelocity;
2266 idMat3 masterAxis;
2267
2268 // get position of master
2269 GetMasterPosition( masterOrigin, masterAxis );
2270
2271 // get master velocities
2272 bindMaster->GetWorldVelocities( masterLinearVelocity, masterAngularVelocity );
2273
2274 // linear velocity relative to master plus master linear and angular velocity
2275 linearVelocity = linearVelocity * masterAxis + masterLinearVelocity +
2276 masterAngularVelocity.Cross( GetPhysics()->GetOrigin() - masterOrigin );
2277 }
2278}
2279
2280/*
2281================
2282idEntity::JoinTeam
2283================
2284*/
2285void idEntity::JoinTeam( idEntity *teammember ) {
2286 idEntity *ent;
2287 idEntity *master;
2288 idEntity *prev;
2289 idEntity *next;
2290
2291 // if we're already on a team, quit it so we can join this one
2292 if ( teamMaster && ( teamMaster != this ) ) {
2293 QuitTeam();
2294 }
2295
2296 assert( teammember );
2297
2298 if ( teammember == this ) {
2299 teamMaster = this;
2300 return;
2301 }
2302
2303 // check if our new team mate is already on a team
2304 master = teammember->teamMaster;
2305 if ( !master ) {
2306 // he's not on a team, so he's the new teamMaster
2307 master = teammember;
2308 teammember->teamMaster = teammember;
2309 teammember->teamChain = this;
2310
2311 // make anyone who's bound to me part of the new team
2312 for( ent = teamChain; ent != NULL; ent = ent->teamChain ) {
2313 ent->teamMaster = master;
2314 }
2315 } else {
2316 // skip past the chain members bound to the entity we're teaming up with
2317 prev = teammember;
2318 next = teammember->teamChain;
2319 if ( bindMaster ) {
2320 // if we have a bindMaster, join after any entities bound to the entity
2321 // we're joining
2322 while( next && next->IsBoundTo( teammember ) ) {
2323 prev = next;
2324 next = next->teamChain;
2325 }
2326 } else {
2327 // if we're not bound to someone, then put us at the end of the team
2328 while( next ) {
2329 prev = next;
2330 next = next->teamChain;
2331 }
2332 }
2333
2334 // make anyone who's bound to me part of the new team and
2335 // also find the last member of my team
2336 for( ent = this; ent->teamChain != NULL; ent = ent->teamChain ) {
2337 ent->teamChain->teamMaster = master;
2338 }
2339
2340 prev->teamChain = this;
2341 ent->teamChain = next;
2342 }
2343
2344 teamMaster = master;
2345
2346 // reorder the active entity list
2347 gameLocal.sortTeamMasters = true;
2348}
2349
2350/*
2351================
2352idEntity::QuitTeam
2353================
2354*/
2355void idEntity::QuitTeam( void ) {
2356 idEntity *ent;
2357
2358 if ( !teamMaster ) {
2359 return;
2360 }
2361
2362 // check if I'm the teamMaster
2363 if ( teamMaster == this ) {
2364 // do we have more than one teammate?
2365 if ( !teamChain->teamChain ) {
2366 // no, break up the team
2367 teamChain->teamMaster = NULL;
2368 } else {
2369 // yes, so make the first teammate the teamMaster
2370 for( ent = teamChain; ent; ent = ent->teamChain ) {
2371 ent->teamMaster = teamChain;
2372 }
2373 }
2374 } else {
2375 assert( teamMaster );
2376 assert( teamMaster->teamChain );
2377
2378 // find the previous member of the teamChain
2379 ent = teamMaster;
2380 while( ent->teamChain != this ) {
2381 assert( ent->teamChain ); // this should never happen
2382 ent = ent->teamChain;
2383 }
2384
2385 // remove this from the teamChain
2386 ent->teamChain = teamChain;
2387
2388 // if no one is left on the team, break it up
2389 if ( !teamMaster->teamChain ) {
2390 teamMaster->teamMaster = NULL;
2391 }
2392 }
2393
2394 teamMaster = NULL;
2395 teamChain = NULL;
2396}
2397
2398/***********************************************************************
2399
2400 Physics.
2401
2402***********************************************************************/
2403
2404/*
2405================
2406idEntity::InitDefaultPhysics
2407================
2408*/
2409void idEntity::InitDefaultPhysics( const idVec3 &origin, const idMat3 &axis ) {
2410 const char *temp;
2411 idClipModel *clipModel = NULL;
2412
2413 // check if a clipmodel key/value pair is set
2414 if ( spawnArgs.GetString( "clipmodel", "", &temp ) ) {
2415 if ( idClipModel::CheckModel( temp ) ) {
2416 clipModel = new idClipModel( temp );
2417 }
2418 }
2419
2420 if ( !spawnArgs.GetBool( "noclipmodel", "0" ) ) {
2421
2422 // check if mins/maxs or size key/value pairs are set
2423 if ( !clipModel ) {
2424 idVec3 size;
2425 idBounds bounds;
2426 bool setClipModel = false;
2427
2428 if ( spawnArgs.GetVector( "mins", NULL, bounds[0] ) &&
2429 spawnArgs.GetVector( "maxs", NULL, bounds[1] ) ) {
2430 setClipModel = true;
2431 if ( bounds[0][0] > bounds[1][0] || bounds[0][1] > bounds[1][1] || bounds[0][2] > bounds[1][2] ) {
2432 gameLocal.Error( "Invalid bounds '%s'-'%s' on entity '%s'", bounds[0].ToString(), bounds[1].ToString(), name.c_str() );
2433 }
2434 } else if ( spawnArgs.GetVector( "size", NULL, size ) ) {
2435 if ( ( size.x < 0.0f ) || ( size.y < 0.0f ) || ( size.z < 0.0f ) ) {
2436 gameLocal.Error( "Invalid size '%s' on entity '%s'", size.ToString(), name.c_str() );
2437 }
2438 bounds[0].Set( size.x * -0.5f, size.y * -0.5f, 0.0f );
2439 bounds[1].Set( size.x * 0.5f, size.y * 0.5f, size.z );
2440 setClipModel = true;
2441 }
2442
2443 if ( setClipModel ) {
2444 int numSides;
2445 idTraceModel trm;
2446
2447 if ( spawnArgs.GetInt( "cylinder", "0", numSides ) && numSides > 0 ) {
2448 trm.SetupCylinder( bounds, numSides < 3 ? 3 : numSides );
2449 } else if ( spawnArgs.GetInt( "cone", "0", numSides ) && numSides > 0 ) {
2450 trm.SetupCone( bounds, numSides < 3 ? 3 : numSides );
2451 } else {
2452 trm.SetupBox( bounds );
2453 }
2454 clipModel = new idClipModel( trm );
2455 }
2456 }
2457
2458 // check if the visual model can be used as collision model
2459 if ( !clipModel ) {
2460 temp = spawnArgs.GetString( "model" );
2461 if ( ( temp != NULL ) && ( *temp != 0 ) ) {
2462 if ( idClipModel::CheckModel( temp ) ) {
2463 clipModel = new idClipModel( temp );
2464 }
2465 }
2466 }
2467 }
2468
2469 defaultPhysicsObj.SetSelf( this );
2470 defaultPhysicsObj.SetClipModel( clipModel, 1.0f );
2471 defaultPhysicsObj.SetOrigin( origin );
2472 defaultPhysicsObj.SetAxis( axis );
2473
2474 physics = &defaultPhysicsObj;
2475}
2476
2477/*
2478================
2479idEntity::SetPhysics
2480================
2481*/
2482void idEntity::SetPhysics( idPhysics *phys ) {
2483 // clear any contacts the current physics object has
2484 if ( physics ) {
2485 physics->ClearContacts();
2486 }
2487 // set new physics object or set the default physics if NULL
2488 if ( phys != NULL ) {
2489 defaultPhysicsObj.SetClipModel( NULL, 1.0f );
2490 physics = phys;
2491 physics->Activate();
2492 } else {
2493 physics = &defaultPhysicsObj;
2494 }
2495 physics->UpdateTime( gameLocal.time );
2496 physics->SetMaster( bindMaster, fl.bindOrientated );
2497}

2518
2519/*
2520================
2521idEntity::RunPhysics
2522================
2523*/
2524bool idEntity::RunPhysics( void ) {
2525 int i, reachedTime, startTime, endTime;
2526 idEntity * part, *blockedPart, *blockingEntity;
2527 trace_t results;
2528 bool moved;
2529
2530 // don't run physics if not enabled
2531 if ( !( thinkFlags & TH_PHYSICS ) ) {
2532 // however do update any animation controllers
2533 if ( UpdateAnimationControllers() ) {
2534 BecomeActive( TH_ANIMATE );
2535 }
2536 return false;
2537 }
2538
2539 // if this entity is a team slave don't do anything because the team master will handle everything
2540 if ( teamMaster && teamMaster != this ) {
2541 return false;
2542 }
2543
2544 startTime = gameLocal.previousTime;
2545 endTime = gameLocal.time;
2546
2547 gameLocal.push.InitSavingPushedEntityPositions();
2548 blockedPart = NULL;
2549
2550 // save the physics state of the whole team and disable the team for collision detection
2551 for ( part = this; part != NULL; part = part->teamChain ) {
2552 if ( part->physics ) {
2553 if ( !part->fl.solidForTeam ) {
2554 part->physics->DisableClip();
2555 }
2556 part->physics->SaveState();
2557 }
2558 }
2559
2560 // move the whole team
2561 for ( part = this; part != NULL; part = part->teamChain ) {
2562
2563 if ( part->physics ) {
2564
2565 // run physics
2566 moved = part->physics->Evaluate( endTime - startTime, endTime );
2567
2568 // check if the object is blocked
2569 blockingEntity = part->physics->GetBlockingEntity();
2570 if ( blockingEntity ) {
2571 blockedPart = part;
2572 break;
2573 }
2574
2575 // if moved or forced to update the visual position and orientation from the physics
2576 if ( moved || part->fl.forcePhysicsUpdate ) {
2577 part->UpdateFromPhysics( false );
2578 }
2579
2580 // update any animation controllers here so an entity bound
2581 // to a joint of this entity gets the correct position
2582 if ( part->UpdateAnimationControllers() ) {
2583 part->BecomeActive( TH_ANIMATE );
2584 }
2585 }
2586 }
2587
2588 // enable the whole team for collision detection
2589 for ( part = this; part != NULL; part = part->teamChain ) {
2590 if ( part->physics ) {
2591 if ( !part->fl.solidForTeam ) {
2592 part->physics->EnableClip();
2593 }
2594 }
2595 }
2596
2597 // if one of the team entities is a pusher and blocked
2598 if ( blockedPart ) {
2599 // move the parts back to the previous position
2600 for ( part = this; part != blockedPart; part = part->teamChain ) {
2601
2602 if ( part->physics ) {
2603
2604 // restore the physics state
2605 part->physics->RestoreState();
2606
2607 // move back the visual position and orientation
2608 part->UpdateFromPhysics( true );
2609 }
2610 }
2611 for ( part = this; part != NULL; part = part->teamChain ) {
2612 if ( part->physics ) {
2613 // update the physics time without moving
2614 part->physics->UpdateTime( endTime );
2615 }
2616 }
2617
2618 // restore the positions of any pushed entities
2619 gameLocal.push.RestorePushedEntityPositions();
2620
2621 if ( gameLocal.isClient ) {
2622 return false;
2623 }
2624
2625 // if the master pusher has a "blocked" function, call it
2626 Signal( SIG_BLOCKED );
2627 ProcessEvent( &EV_TeamBlocked, blockedPart, blockingEntity );
2628 // call the blocked function on the blocked part
2629 blockedPart->ProcessEvent( &EV_PartBlocked, blockingEntity );
2630 return false;
2631 }
2632
2633 // set pushed
2634 for ( i = 0; i < gameLocal.push.GetNumPushedEntities(); i++ ) {
2635 idEntity *ent = gameLocal.push.GetPushedEntity( i );
2636 ent->physics->SetPushed( endTime - startTime );
2637 }
2638
2639 if ( gameLocal.isClient ) {
2640 return true;
2641 }
2642
2643 // post reached event if the current time is at or past the end point of the motion
2644 for ( part = this; part != NULL; part = part->teamChain ) {
2645
2646 if ( part->physics ) {
2647
2648 reachedTime = part->physics->GetLinearEndTime();
2649 if ( startTime < reachedTime && endTime >= reachedTime ) {
2650 part->ProcessEvent( &EV_ReachedPos );
2651 }
2652 reachedTime = part->physics->GetAngularEndTime();
2653 if ( startTime < reachedTime && endTime >= reachedTime ) {
2654 part->ProcessEvent( &EV_ReachedAng );
2655 }
2656 }
2657 }
2658
2659 return true;
2660}
2661
2662/*
2663================
2664idEntity::UpdateFromPhysics
2665================
2666*/
2667void idEntity::UpdateFromPhysics( bool moveBack ) {
2668
2669 if ( IsType( idActor::Type ) ) {
2670 idActor *actor = static_cast<idActor *>( this );
2671
2672 // set master delta angles for actors
2673 if ( GetBindMaster() ) {
2674 idAngles delta = actor->GetDeltaViewAngles();
2675 if ( moveBack ) {
2676 delta.yaw -= static_cast<idPhysics_Actor *>(physics)->GetMasterDeltaYaw();
2677 } else {
2678 delta.yaw += static_cast<idPhysics_Actor *>(physics)->GetMasterDeltaYaw();
2679 }
2680 actor->SetDeltaViewAngles( delta );
2681 }
2682 }
2683
2684 UpdateVisuals();
2685}

2724/*
2725================
2726idEntity::GetFloorPos
2727================
2728*/
2729bool idEntity::GetFloorPos( float max_dist, idVec3 &floorpos ) const {
2730 trace_t result;
2731
2732 if ( !GetPhysics()->HasGroundContacts() ) {
2733 GetPhysics()->ClipTranslation( result, GetPhysics()->GetGravityNormal() * max_dist, NULL );
2734 if ( result.fraction < 1.0f ) {
2735 floorpos = result.endpos;
2736 return true;
2737 } else {
2738 floorpos = GetPhysics()->GetOrigin();
2739 return false;
2740 }
2741 } else {
2742 floorpos = GetPhysics()->GetOrigin();
2743 return true;
2744 }
2745}

2855/***********************************************************************
2856
2857 Damage

2860
2861/*
2862============
2863idEntity::CanDamage
2864
2865Returns true if the inflictor can directly damage the target. Used for
2866explosions and melee attacks.
2867============
2868*/
2869bool idEntity::CanDamage( const idVec3 &origin, idVec3 &damagePoint ) const {
2870 idVec3 dest;
2871 trace_t tr;
2872 idVec3 midpoint;
2873
2874 // use the midpoint of the bounds instead of the origin, because
2875 // bmodels may have their origin at 0,0,0
2876 midpoint = ( GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds()[0] + GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds()[1] ) * 0.5;
2877
2878 dest = midpoint;
2879 gameLocal.clip.TracePoint( tr, origin, dest, MASK_SOLID, NULL );
2880 if ( tr.fraction == 1.0 || ( gameLocal.GetTraceEntity( tr ) == this ) ) {
2881 damagePoint = tr.endpos;
2882 return true;
2883 }
2884
2885 // this should probably check in the plane of projection, rather than in world coordinate
2886 dest = midpoint;
2887 dest[0] += 15.0;
2888 dest[1] += 15.0;
2889 gameLocal.clip.TracePoint( tr, origin, dest, MASK_SOLID, NULL );
2890 if ( tr.fraction == 1.0 || ( gameLocal.GetTraceEntity( tr ) == this ) ) {
2891 damagePoint = tr.endpos;
2892 return true;
2893 }
2894
2895 dest = midpoint;
2896 dest[0] += 15.0;
2897 dest[1] -= 15.0;
2898 gameLocal.clip.TracePoint( tr, origin, dest, MASK_SOLID, NULL );
2899 if ( tr.fraction == 1.0 || ( gameLocal.GetTraceEntity( tr ) == this ) ) {
2900 damagePoint = tr.endpos;
2901 return true;
2902 }
2903
2904 dest = midpoint;
2905 dest[0] -= 15.0;
2906 dest[1] += 15.0;
2907 gameLocal.clip.TracePoint( tr, origin, dest, MASK_SOLID, NULL );
2908 if ( tr.fraction == 1.0 || ( gameLocal.GetTraceEntity( tr ) == this ) ) {
2909 damagePoint = tr.endpos;
2910 return true;
2911 }
2912
2913 dest = midpoint;
2914 dest[0] -= 15.0;
2915 dest[1] -= 15.0;
2916 gameLocal.clip.TracePoint( tr, origin, dest, MASK_SOLID, NULL );
2917 if ( tr.fraction == 1.0 || ( gameLocal.GetTraceEntity( tr ) == this ) ) {
2918 damagePoint = tr.endpos;
2919 return true;
2920 }
2921
2922 dest = midpoint;
2923 dest[2] += 15.0;
2924 gameLocal.clip.TracePoint( tr, origin, dest, MASK_SOLID, NULL );
2925 if ( tr.fraction == 1.0 || ( gameLocal.GetTraceEntity( tr ) == this ) ) {
2926 damagePoint = tr.endpos;
2927 return true;
2928 }
2929
2930 dest = midpoint;
2931 dest[2] -= 15.0;
2932 gameLocal.clip.TracePoint( tr, origin, dest, MASK_SOLID, NULL );
2933 if ( tr.fraction == 1.0 || ( gameLocal.GetTraceEntity( tr ) == this ) ) {
2934 damagePoint = tr.endpos;
2935 return true;
2936 }
2937
2938 return false;
2939}
2940
2941/*
2942================
2943idEntity::DamageFeedback
2944
2945callback function for when another entity received damage from this entity. damage can be adjusted and returned to the caller.
2946================
2947*/
2948void idEntity::DamageFeedback( idEntity *victim, idEntity *inflictor, int &damage ) {
2949 // implemented in subclasses
2950}
2951
2952/*
2953============
2954Damage
2955
2956this entity that is being damaged
2957inflictor entity that is causing the damage
2958attacker entity that caused the inflictor to damage targ
2959 example: this=monster, inflictor=rocket, attacker=player
2960
2961dir direction of the attack for knockback in global space
2962point point at which the damage is being inflicted, used for headshots
2963damage amount of damage being inflicted
2964
2965inflictor, attacker, dir, and point can be NULL for environmental effects
2966
2967============
2968*/
2969void idEntity::Damage( idEntity *inflictor, idEntity *attacker, const idVec3 &dir,
2970 const char *damageDefName, const float damageScale, const int location ) {
2971 if ( !fl.takedamage ) {
2972 return;
2973 }
2974
2975 if ( !inflictor ) {
2976 inflictor = gameLocal.world;
2977 }
2978
2979 if ( !attacker ) {
2980 attacker = gameLocal.world;
2981 }
2982
2983 const idDict *damageDef = gameLocal.FindEntityDefDict( damageDefName );
2984 if ( !damageDef ) {
2985 gameLocal.Error( "Unknown damageDef '%s'\n", damageDefName );
2986 }
2987
2988 int damage = damageDef->GetInt( "damage" );
2989
2990 // inform the attacker that they hit someone
2991 attacker->DamageFeedback( this, inflictor, damage );
2992 if ( damage ) {
2993 // do the damage
2994 health -= damage;
2995 if ( health <= 0 ) {
2996 if ( health < -999 ) {
2997 health = -999;
2998 }
2999
3000 Killed( inflictor, attacker, damage, dir, location );
3001 } else {
3002 Pain( inflictor, attacker, damage, dir, location );
3003 }
3004 }
3005}
3006
3007/*
3008================
3009idEntity::AddDamageEffect
3010================
3011*/
3012void idEntity::AddDamageEffect( const trace_t &collision, const idVec3 &velocity, const char *damageDefName ) {
3013 const char *sound, *decal, *key;
3014
3015 const idDeclEntityDef *def = gameLocal.FindEntityDef( damageDefName, false );
3016 if ( def == NULL ) {
3017 return;
3018 }
3019
3020 const char *materialType = gameLocal.sufaceTypeNames[ collision.c.material->GetSurfaceType() ];
3021
3022 // start impact sound based on material type
3023 key = va( "snd_%s", materialType );
3024 sound = spawnArgs.GetString( key );
3025 if ( *sound == '\0' ) {
3026 sound = def->dict.GetString( key );
3027 }
3028 if ( *sound != '\0' ) {
3029 StartSoundShader( declManager->FindSound( sound ), SND_CHANNEL_BODY, 0, false, NULL );
3030 }
3031
3032 if ( g_decals.GetBool() ) {
3033 // place a wound overlay on the model
3034 key = va( "mtr_wound_%s", materialType );
3035 decal = spawnArgs.RandomPrefix( key, gameLocal.random );
3036 if ( *decal == '\0' ) {
3037 decal = def->dict.RandomPrefix( key, gameLocal.random );
3038 }
3039 if ( *decal != '\0' ) {
3040 idVec3 dir = velocity;
3041 dir.Normalize();
3042 ProjectOverlay( collision.c.point, dir, 20.0f, decal );
3043 }
3044 }
3045}

3077/*
3078================
3079idEntity::ShouldConstructScriptObjectAtSpawn
3080
3081Called during idEntity::Spawn to see if it should construct the script object or not.
3082Overridden by subclasses that need to spawn the script object themselves.
3083================
3084*/
3085bool idEntity::ShouldConstructScriptObjectAtSpawn( void ) const {
3086 return true;
3087}
3088
3089/*
3090================
3091idEntity::ConstructScriptObject
3092
3093Called during idEntity::Spawn. Calls the constructor on the script object.
3094Can be overridden by subclasses when a thread doesn't need to be allocated.
3095================
3096*/
3097idThread *idEntity::ConstructScriptObject( void ) {
3098 idThread *thread;
3099 const function_t *constructor;
3100
3101 // init the script object's data
3102 scriptObject.ClearObject();
3103
3104 // call script object's constructor
3105 constructor = scriptObject.GetConstructor();
3106 if ( constructor ) {
3107 // start a thread that will initialize after Spawn is done being called
3108 thread = new idThread();
3109 thread->SetThreadName( name.c_str() );
3110 thread->CallFunction( this, constructor, true );
3111 thread->DelayedStart( 0 );
3112 } else {
3113 thread = NULL;
3114 }
3115
3116 // clear out the object's memory
3117 scriptObject.ClearObject();
3118
3119 return thread;
3120}
3121
3122/*
3123================
3124idEntity::DeconstructScriptObject
3125
3126Called during idEntity::~idEntity. Calls the destructor on the script object.
3127Can be overridden by subclasses when a thread doesn't need to be allocated.
3128Not called during idGameLocal::MapShutdown.
3129================
3130*/
3131void idEntity::DeconstructScriptObject( void ) {
3132 idThread *thread;
3133 const function_t *destructor;
3134
3135 // don't bother calling the script object's destructor on map shutdown
3136 if ( gameLocal.GameState() == GAMESTATE_SHUTDOWN ) {
3137 return;
3138 }
3139
3140 // call script object's destructor
3141 destructor = scriptObject.GetDestructor();
3142 if ( destructor ) {
3143 // start a thread that will run immediately and be destroyed
3144 thread = new idThread();
3145 thread->SetThreadName( name.c_str() );
3146 thread->CallFunction( this, destructor, true );
3147 thread->Execute();
3148 delete thread;
3149 }
3150}
3151
3152/*
3153================
3154idEntity::HasSignal
3155================
3156*/
3157bool idEntity::HasSignal( signalNum_t signalnum ) const {
3158 if ( !signals ) {
3159 return false;
3160 }
3161 assert( ( signalnum >= 0 ) && ( signalnum < NUM_SIGNALS ) );
3162 return ( signals->signal[ signalnum ].Num() > 0 );
3163}
3164
3165/*
3166================
3167idEntity::SetSignal
3168================
3169*/
3170void idEntity::SetSignal( signalNum_t signalnum, idThread *thread, const function_t *function ) {
3171 int i;
3172 int num;
3173 signal_t sig;
3174 int threadnum;
3175
3176 assert( ( signalnum >= 0 ) && ( signalnum < NUM_SIGNALS ) );
3177
3178 if ( !signals ) {
3179 signals = new signalList_t;
3180 }
3181
3182 assert( thread );
3183 threadnum = thread->GetThreadNum();
3184
3185 num = signals->signal[ signalnum ].Num();
3186 for( i = 0; i < num; i++ ) {
3187 if ( signals->signal[ signalnum ][ i ].threadnum == threadnum ) {
3188 signals->signal[ signalnum ][ i ].function = function;
3189 return;
3190 }
3191 }
3192
3193 if ( num >= MAX_SIGNAL_THREADS ) {
3194 thread->Error( "Exceeded maximum number of signals per object" );
3195 }
3196
3197 sig.threadnum = threadnum;
3198 sig.function = function;
3199 signals->signal[ signalnum ].Append( sig );
3200}
3201
3202/*
3203================
3204idEntity::ClearSignal
3205================
3206*/
3207void idEntity::ClearSignal( idThread *thread, signalNum_t signalnum ) {
3208 assert( thread );
3209 if ( ( signalnum < 0 ) || ( signalnum >= NUM_SIGNALS ) ) {
3210 gameLocal.Error( "Signal out of range" );
3211 }
3212
3213 if ( !signals ) {
3214 return;
3215 }
3216
3217 signals->signal[ signalnum ].Clear();
3218}
3219
3220/*
3221================
3222idEntity::ClearSignalThread
3223================
3224*/
3225void idEntity::ClearSignalThread( signalNum_t signalnum, idThread *thread ) {
3226 int i;
3227 int num;
3228 int threadnum;
3229
3230 assert( thread );
3231
3232 if ( ( signalnum < 0 ) || ( signalnum >= NUM_SIGNALS ) ) {
3233 gameLocal.Error( "Signal out of range" );
3234 }
3235
3236 if ( !signals ) {
3237 return;
3238 }
3239
3240 threadnum = thread->GetThreadNum();
3241
3242 num = signals->signal[ signalnum ].Num();
3243 for( i = 0; i < num; i++ ) {
3244 if ( signals->signal[ signalnum ][ i ].threadnum == threadnum ) {
3245 signals->signal[ signalnum ].RemoveIndex( i );
3246 return;
3247 }
3248 }
3249}
3250
3251/*
3252================
3253idEntity::Signal
3254================
3255*/
3256void idEntity::Signal( signalNum_t signalnum ) {
3257 int i;
3258 int num;
3259 signal_t sigs[ MAX_SIGNAL_THREADS ];
3260 idThread *thread;
3261
3262 assert( ( signalnum >= 0 ) && ( signalnum < NUM_SIGNALS ) );
3263
3264 if ( !signals ) {
3265 return;
3266 }
3267
3268 // we copy the signal list since each thread has the potential
3269 // to end any of the threads in the list. By copying the list
3270 // we don't have to worry about the list changing as we're
3271 // processing it.
3272 num = signals->signal[ signalnum ].Num();
3273 for( i = 0; i < num; i++ ) {
3274 sigs[ i ] = signals->signal[ signalnum ][ i ];
3275 }
3276
3277 // clear out the signal list so that we don't get into an infinite loop
3278 signals->signal[ signalnum ].Clear();
3279
3280 for( i = 0; i < num; i++ ) {
3281 thread = idThread::GetThread( sigs[ i ].threadnum );
3282 if ( thread ) {
3283 thread->CallFunction( this, sigs[ i ].function, true );
3284 thread->Execute();
3285 }
3286 }
3287}
3288
3289/*
3290================
3291idEntity::SignalEvent
3292================
3293*/
3294void idEntity::SignalEvent( idThread *thread, signalNum_t signalnum ) {
3295 if ( ( signalnum < 0 ) || ( signalnum >= NUM_SIGNALS ) ) {
3296 gameLocal.Error( "Signal out of range" );
3297 }
3298
3299 if ( !signals ) {
3300 return;
3301 }
3302
3303 Signal( signalnum );
3304}

3327/*
3328================
3329idEntity::HandleGuiCommands
3330================
3331*/
3332bool idEntity::HandleGuiCommands( idEntity *entityGui, const char *cmds ) {
3333 idEntity *targetEnt;
3334 bool ret = false;
3335 if ( entityGui && cmds && *cmds ) {
3336 idLexer src;
3337 idToken token, token2, token3, token4;
3338 src.LoadMemory( cmds, strlen( cmds ), "guiCommands" );
3339 while( 1 ) {
3340
3341 if ( !src.ReadToken( &token ) ) {
3342 return ret;
3343 }
3344
3345 if ( token == ";" ) {
3346 continue;
3347 }
3348
3349 if ( token.Icmp( "activate" ) == 0 ) {
3350 bool targets = true;
3351 if ( src.ReadToken( &token2 ) ) {
3352 if ( token2 == ";" ) {
3353 src.UnreadToken( &token2 );
3354 } else {
3355 targets = false;
3356 }
3357 }
3358
3359 if ( targets ) {
3360 entityGui->ActivateTargets( this );
3361 } else {
3362 idEntity *ent = gameLocal.FindEntity( token2 );
3363 if ( ent ) {
3364 ent->Signal( SIG_TRIGGER );
3365 ent->PostEventMS( &EV_Activate, 0, this );
3366 }
3367 }
3368
3369 entityGui->renderEntity.shaderParms[ SHADERPARM_MODE ] = 1.0f;
3370 continue;
3371 }
3372
3373
3374 if ( token.Icmp( "runScript" ) == 0 ) {
3375 if ( src.ReadToken( &token2 ) ) {
3376 while( src.CheckTokenString( "::" ) ) {
3377 idToken token3;
3378 if ( !src.ReadToken( &token3 ) ) {
3379 gameLocal.Error( "Expecting function name following '::' in gui for entity '%s'", entityGui->name.c_str() );
3380 }
3381 token2 += "::" + token3;
3382 }
3383 const function_t *func = gameLocal.program.FindFunction( token2 );
3384 if ( !func ) {
3385 gameLocal.Error( "Can't find function '%s' for gui in entity '%s'", token2.c_str(), entityGui->name.c_str() );
3386 } else {
3387 idThread *thread = new idThread( func );
3388 thread->DelayedStart( 0 );
3389 }
3390 }
3391 continue;
3392 }
3393
3394 if ( token.Icmp("play") == 0 ) {
3395 if ( src.ReadToken( &token2 ) ) {
3396 const idSoundShader *shader = declManager->FindSound(token2);
3397 entityGui->StartSoundShader( shader, SND_CHANNEL_ANY, 0, false, NULL );
3398 }
3399 continue;
3400 }
3401
3402 if ( token.Icmp( "setkeyval" ) == 0 ) {
3403 if ( src.ReadToken( &token2 ) && src.ReadToken(&token3) && src.ReadToken( &token4 ) ) {
3404 idEntity *ent = gameLocal.FindEntity( token2 );
3405 if ( ent ) {
3406 ent->spawnArgs.Set( token3, token4 );
3407 ent->UpdateChangeableSpawnArgs( NULL );
3408 ent->UpdateVisuals();
3409 }
3410 }
3411 continue;
3412 }
3413
3414 if ( token.Icmp( "setshaderparm" ) == 0 ) {
3415 if ( src.ReadToken( &token2 ) && src.ReadToken(&token3) ) {
3416 entityGui->SetShaderParm( atoi( token2 ), atof( token3 ) );
3417 entityGui->UpdateVisuals();
3418 }
3419 continue;
3420 }
3421
3422 if ( token.Icmp("close") == 0 ) {
3423 ret = true;
3424 continue;
3425 }
3426
3427 if ( !token.Icmp( "turkeyscore" ) ) {
3428 if ( src.ReadToken( &token2 ) && entityGui->renderEntity.gui[0] ) {
3429 int score = entityGui->renderEntity.gui[0]->State().GetInt( "score" );
3430 score += atoi( token2 );
3431 entityGui->renderEntity.gui[0]->SetStateInt( "score", score );
3432 if ( gameLocal.GetLocalPlayer() && score >= 25000 && !gameLocal.GetLocalPlayer()->inventory.turkeyScore ) {
3433 gameLocal.GetLocalPlayer()->GiveEmail( "highScore" );
3434 gameLocal.GetLocalPlayer()->inventory.turkeyScore = true;
3435 }
3436 }
3437 continue;
3438 }
3439
3440
3441 // handy for debugging GUI stuff
3442 if ( !token.Icmp( "print" ) ) {
3443 idStr msg;
3444 while ( src.ReadToken( &token2 ) ) {
3445 if ( token2 == ";" ) {
3446 src.UnreadToken( &token2 );
3447 break;
3448 }
3449 msg += token2.c_str();
3450 }
3451 common->Printf( "ent gui 0x%x '%s': %s\n", entityNumber, name.c_str(), msg.c_str() );
3452 continue;
3453 }
3454
3455 // if we get to this point we don't know how to handle it
3456 src.UnreadToken(&token);
3457 if ( !HandleSingleGuiCommand( entityGui, &src ) ) {
3458 // not handled there see if entity or any of its targets can handle it
3459 // this will only work for one target atm
3460 if ( entityGui->HandleSingleGuiCommand( entityGui, &src ) ) {
3461 continue;
3462 }
3463
3464 int c = entityGui->targets.Num();
3465 int i;
3466 for ( i = 0; i < c; i++) {
3467 targetEnt = entityGui->targets[ i ].GetEntity();
3468 if ( targetEnt && targetEnt->HandleSingleGuiCommand( entityGui, &src ) ) {
3469 break;
3470 }
3471 }
3472
3473 if ( i == c ) {
3474 // not handled
3475 common->DPrintf( "idEntity::HandleGuiCommands: '%s' not handled\n", token.c_str() );
3476 src.ReadToken( &token );
3477 }
3478 }
3479
3480 }
3481 }
3482 return ret;
3483}

3500/*
3501===============
3502idEntity::FindTargets
3503
3504We have to wait until all entities are spawned
3505Used to build lists of targets after the entity is spawned. Since not all entities
3506have been spawned when the entity is created at map load time, we have to wait
3507===============
3508*/
3509void idEntity::FindTargets( void ) {
3510 int i;
3511
3512 // targets can be a list of multiple names
3513 gameLocal.GetTargets( spawnArgs, targets, "target" );
3514
3515 // ensure that we don't target ourselves since that could cause an infinite loop when activating entities
3516 for( i = 0; i < targets.Num(); i++ ) {
3517 if ( targets[ i ].GetEntity() == this ) {
3518 gameLocal.Error( "Entity '%s' is targeting itself", name.c_str() );
3519 }
3520 }
3521}

3525idEntity::RemoveNullTargets
3526================
3527*/
3528void idEntity::RemoveNullTargets( void ) {

3530
3531 for( i = targets.Num() - 1; i >= 0; i-- ) {
3532 if ( !targets[ i ].GetEntity() ) {
3533 targets.RemoveIndex( i );
3534 }
3535 }
3536}

3538/*
3539==============================
3540idEntity::ActivateTargets
3541
3542"activator" should be set to the entity that initiated the firing.
3543==============================
3544*/
3545void idEntity::ActivateTargets( idEntity *activator ) const {
3546 idEntity *ent;
3547 int i, j;
3548
3549 for( i = 0; i < targets.Num(); i++ ) {
3550 ent = targets[ i ].GetEntity();
3551 if ( !ent ) {
3552 continue;
3553 }
3554 if ( ent->RespondsTo( EV_Activate ) || ent->HasSignal( SIG_TRIGGER ) ) {
3555 ent->Signal( SIG_TRIGGER );
3556 ent->ProcessEvent( &EV_Activate, activator );
3557 }
3558 for ( j = 0; j < MAX_RENDERENTITY_GUI; j++ ) {
3559 if ( ent->renderEntity.gui[ j ] ) {
3560 ent->renderEntity.gui[ j ]->Trigger( gameLocal.time );
3561 }
3562 }
3563 }
3564}

3584/*
3585============
3586idEntity::TouchTriggers
3587
3588 Activate all trigger entities touched at the current position.
3589============
3590*/
3591bool idEntity::TouchTriggers( void ) const {
3592 int i, numClipModels, numEntities;
3593 idClipModel * cm;
3594 idClipModel * clipModels[ MAX_GENTITIES ];
3595 idEntity * ent;
3596 trace_t trace;
3597
3598 memset( &trace, 0, sizeof( trace ) );
3599 trace.endpos = GetPhysics()->GetOrigin();
3600 trace.endAxis = GetPhysics()->GetAxis();
3601
3602 numClipModels = gameLocal.clip.ClipModelsTouchingBounds( GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds(), CONTENTS_TRIGGER, clipModels, MAX_GENTITIES );
3603 numEntities = 0;
3604
3605 for ( i = 0; i < numClipModels; i++ ) {
3606 cm = clipModels[ i ];
3607
3608 // don't touch it if we're the owner
3609 if ( cm->GetOwner() == this ) {
3610 continue;
3611 }
3612
3613 ent = cm->GetEntity();
3614
3615 if ( !ent->RespondsTo( EV_Touch ) && !ent->HasSignal( SIG_TOUCH ) ) {
3616 continue;
3617 }
3618
3619 if ( !GetPhysics()->ClipContents( cm ) ) {
3620 continue;
3621 }
3622
3623 numEntities++;
3624
3625 trace.c.contents = cm->GetContents();
3626 trace.c.entityNum = cm->GetEntity()->entityNumber;
3627 trace.c.id = cm->GetId();
3628
3629 ent->Signal( SIG_TOUCH );
3630 ent->ProcessEvent( &EV_Touch, this, &trace );
3631
3632 if ( !gameLocal.entities[ entityNumber ] ) {
3633 gameLocal.Printf( "entity was removed while touching triggers\n" );
3634 return true;
3635 }
3636 }
3637
3638 return ( numEntities != 0 );
3639}
3640
3641/*
3642================
3643idEntity::GetSpline
3644================
3645*/
3646idCurve_Spline<idVec3> *idEntity::GetSpline( void ) const {
3647 int i, numPoints, t;
3648 const idKeyValue *kv;
3649 idLexer lex;
3650 idVec3 v;
3651 idCurve_Spline<idVec3> *spline;
3652 const char *curveTag = "curve_";
3653
3654 kv = spawnArgs.MatchPrefix( curveTag );
3655 if ( !kv ) {
3656 return NULL;
3657 }
3658
3659 idStr str = kv->GetKey().Right( kv->GetKey().Length() - strlen( curveTag ) );
3660 if ( str.Icmp( "CatmullRomSpline" ) == 0 ) {
3661 spline = new idCurve_CatmullRomSpline<idVec3>();
3662 } else if ( str.Icmp( "nubs" ) == 0 ) {
3663 spline = new idCurve_NonUniformBSpline<idVec3>();
3664 } else if ( str.Icmp( "nurbs" ) == 0 ) {
3665 spline = new idCurve_NURBS<idVec3>();
3666 } else {
3667 spline = new idCurve_BSpline<idVec3>();
3668 }
3669
3670 spline->SetBoundaryType( idCurve_Spline<idVec3>::BT_CLAMPED );
3671
3672 lex.LoadMemory( kv->GetValue(), kv->GetValue().Length(), curveTag );
3673 numPoints = lex.ParseInt();
3674 lex.ExpectTokenString( "(" );
3675 for ( t = i = 0; i < numPoints; i++, t += 100 ) {
3676 v.x = lex.ParseFloat();
3677 v.y = lex.ParseFloat();
3678 v.z = lex.ParseFloat();
3679 spline->AddValue( t, v );
3680 }
3681 lex.ExpectTokenString( ")" );
3682
3683 return spline;
3684}

3764/*
3765================
3766idEntity::Event_RandomTarget
3767================
3768*/
3769void idEntity::Event_RandomTarget( const char *ignore ) {
3770 int num;
3771 idEntity *ent;
3772 int i;
3773 int ignoreNum;
3774
3775 RemoveNullTargets();
3776 if ( !targets.Num() ) {
3777 idThread::ReturnEntity( NULL );
3778 return;
3779 }
3780
3781 ignoreNum = -1;
3782 if ( ignore && ( ignore[ 0 ] != 0 ) && ( targets.Num() > 1 ) ) {
3783 for( i = 0; i < targets.Num(); i++ ) {
3784 ent = targets[ i ].GetEntity();
3785 if ( ent && ( ent->name == ignore ) ) {
3786 ignoreNum = i;
3787 break;
3788 }
3789 }
3790 }
3791
3792 if ( ignoreNum >= 0 ) {
3793 num = gameLocal.random.RandomInt( targets.Num() - 1 );
3794 if ( num >= ignoreNum ) {
3795 num++;
3796 }
3797 } else {
3798 num = gameLocal.random.RandomInt( targets.Num() );
3799 }
3800
3801 ent = targets[ num ].GetEntity();
3802 idThread::ReturnEntity( ent );
3803}
