3850/*
3851================
3852idEntity::Event_SpawnBind
3853================
3854*/
3855void idEntity::Event_SpawnBind( void ) {
3856 idEntity *parent;
3857 const char *bind, *joint, *bindanim;
3858 jointHandle_t bindJoint;
3859 bool bindOrientated;
3860 int id;
3861 const idAnim *anim;
3862 int animNum;
3863 idAnimator *parentAnimator;
3864
3865 if ( spawnArgs.GetString( "bind", "", &bind ) ) {
3866 if ( idStr::Icmp( bind, "worldspawn" ) == 0 ) {
3867 //FIXME: Completely unneccessary since the worldspawn is called "world"
3868 parent = gameLocal.world;
3869 } else {
3870 parent = gameLocal.FindEntity( bind );
3871 }
3872 bindOrientated = spawnArgs.GetBool( "bindOrientated", "1" );
3873 if ( parent ) {
3874 // bind to a joint of the skeletal model of the parent
3875 if ( spawnArgs.GetString( "bindToJoint", "", &joint ) && *joint ) {
3876 parentAnimator = parent->GetAnimator();
3877 if ( !parentAnimator ) {
3878 gameLocal.Error( "Cannot bind to joint '%s' on '%s'. Entity does not support skeletal models.", joint, name.c_str() );
3879 }
3880 bindJoint = parentAnimator->GetJointHandle( joint );
3881 if ( bindJoint == INVALID_JOINT ) {
3882 gameLocal.Error( "Joint '%s' not found for bind on '%s'", joint, name.c_str() );
3883 }
3884
3885 // bind it relative to a specific anim
3886 if ( ( parent->spawnArgs.GetString( "bindanim", "", &bindanim ) || parent->spawnArgs.GetString( "anim", "", &bindanim ) ) && *bindanim ) {
3887 animNum = parentAnimator->GetAnim( bindanim );
3888 if ( !animNum ) {
3889 gameLocal.Error( "Anim '%s' not found for bind on '%s'", bindanim, name.c_str() );
3890 }
3891 anim = parentAnimator->GetAnim( animNum );
3892 if ( !anim ) {
3893 gameLocal.Error( "Anim '%s' not found for bind on '%s'", bindanim, name.c_str() );
3894 }
3895
3896 // make sure parent's render origin has been set
3897 parent->UpdateModelTransform();
3898
3899 //FIXME: need a BindToJoint that accepts a joint position
3900 parentAnimator->CreateFrame( gameLocal.time, true );
3901 idJointMat *frame = parent->renderEntity.joints;
3902 gameEdit->ANIM_CreateAnimFrame( parentAnimator->ModelHandle(), anim->MD5Anim( 0 ), parent->renderEntity.numJoints, frame, 0, parentAnimator->ModelDef()->GetVisualOffset(), parentAnimator->RemoveOrigin() );
3903 BindToJoint( parent, joint, bindOrientated );
3904 parentAnimator->ForceUpdate();
3905 } else {
3906 BindToJoint( parent, joint, bindOrientated );
3907 }
3908 }
3909 // bind to a body of the physics object of the parent
3910 else if ( spawnArgs.GetInt( "bindToBody", "0", id ) ) {
3911 BindToBody( parent, id, bindOrientated );
3912 }
3913 // bind to the parent
3914 else {
3915 Bind( parent, bindOrientated );
3916 }
3917 }
3918 }
3919}
3920
3921/*
3922================
3923idEntity::Event_SetOwner
3924================
3925*/
3926void idEntity::Event_SetOwner( idEntity *owner ) {
3927 int i;
3928
3929 for ( i = 0; i < GetPhysics()->GetNumClipModels(); i++ ) {
3930 GetPhysics()->GetClipModel( i )->SetOwner( owner );

4279 previous = spawnArgs.FindKey( lastMatch );
4280 } else {
4281 previous = NULL;
4282 }
4283
4284 kv = spawnArgs.MatchPrefix( prefix, previous );
4285 if ( !kv ) {
4286 idThread::ReturnString( "" );

4288 idThread::ReturnString( kv->GetKey() );
4289 }
4290}

4351/*
4352================
4353idEntity::Event_GetEntityKey
4354================
4355*/
4356void idEntity::Event_GetEntityKey( const char *key ) {
4357 idEntity *ent;
4358 const char *entname;
4359
4360 if ( !spawnArgs.GetString( key, NULL, &entname ) ) {
4361 idThread::ReturnEntity( NULL );
4362 return;
4363 }
4364
4365 ent = gameLocal.FindEntity( entname );
4366 if ( !ent ) {
4367 gameLocal.Warning( "Couldn't find entity '%s' specified in '%s' key in entity '%s'", entname, key, name.c_str() );
4368 }
4369
4370 idThread::ReturnEntity( ent );
4371}
4372
4373/*
4374================
4375idEntity::Event_RestorePosition
4376================
4377*/
4378void idEntity::Event_RestorePosition( void ) {
4379 idVec3 org;
4380 idAngles angles;
4381 idMat3 axis;
4382 idEntity * part;
4383
4384 spawnArgs.GetVector( "origin", "0 0 0", org );
4385
4386 // get the rotation matrix in either full form, or single angle form
4387 if ( spawnArgs.GetMatrix( "rotation", "1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1", axis ) ) {
4388 angles = axis.ToAngles();
4389 } else {
4390 angles[ 0 ] = 0;
4391 angles[ 1 ] = spawnArgs.GetFloat( "angle" );
4392 angles[ 2 ] = 0;
4393 }
4394
4395 Teleport( org, angles, NULL );
4396
4397 for ( part = teamChain; part != NULL; part = part->teamChain ) {
4398 if ( part->bindMaster != this ) {
4399 continue;
4400 }
4401 if ( part->GetPhysics()->IsType( idPhysics_Parametric::Type ) ) {
4402 if ( static_cast<idPhysics_Parametric *>(part->GetPhysics())->IsPusher() ) {
4403 gameLocal.Warning( "teleported '%s' which has the pushing mover '%s' bound to it\n", GetName(), part->GetName() );
4404 }
4405 } else if ( part->GetPhysics()->IsType( idPhysics_AF::Type ) ) {
4406 gameLocal.Warning( "teleported '%s' which has the articulated figure '%s' bound to it\n", GetName(), part->GetName() );
4407 }
4408 }
4409}
4410
4411/*
4412================
4413idEntity::Event_UpdateCameraTarget
4414================
4415*/
4416void idEntity::Event_UpdateCameraTarget( void ) {
4417 const char *target;
4418 const idKeyValue *kv;
4419 idVec3 dir;
4420
4421 target = spawnArgs.GetString( "cameraTarget" );
4422
4423 cameraTarget = gameLocal.FindEntity( target );
4424
4425 if ( cameraTarget ) {
4426 kv = cameraTarget->spawnArgs.MatchPrefix( "target", NULL );
4427 while( kv ) {
4428 idEntity *ent = gameLocal.FindEntity( kv->GetValue() );
4429 if ( ent && idStr::Icmp( ent->GetEntityDefName(), "target_null" ) == 0) {
4430 dir = ent->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin() - cameraTarget->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin();
4431 dir.Normalize();
4432 cameraTarget->SetAxis( dir.ToMat3() );
4433 SetAxis(dir.ToMat3());
4434 break;
4435 }
4436 kv = cameraTarget->spawnArgs.MatchPrefix( "target", kv );
4437 }
4438 }
4439 UpdateVisuals();
4440}

4521/*
4522=====================
4523idEntity::Event_CallFunction
4524=====================
4525*/
4526void idEntity::Event_CallFunction( const char *funcname ) {
4527 const function_t *func;
4528 idThread *thread;
4529
4530 thread = idThread::CurrentThread();
4531 if ( !thread ) {
4532 gameLocal.Error( "Event 'callFunction' called from outside thread" );
4533 }
4534
4535 func = scriptObject.GetFunction( funcname );
4536 if ( !func ) {
4537 gameLocal.Error( "Unknown function '%s' in '%s'", funcname, scriptObject.GetTypeName() );
4538 }
4539
4540 if ( func->type->NumParameters() != 1 ) {
4541 gameLocal.Error( "Function '%s' has the wrong number of parameters for 'callFunction'", funcname );
4542 }
4543 if ( !scriptObject.GetTypeDef()->Inherits( func->type->GetParmType( 0 ) ) ) {
4544 gameLocal.Error( "Function '%s' is the wrong type for 'callFunction'", funcname );
4545 }
4546
4547 // function args will be invalid after this call
4548 thread->CallFunction( this, func, false );
4549}

4577/*
4578================
4579idEntity::WriteBindToSnapshot
4580================
4581*/
4582void idEntity::WriteBindToSnapshot( idBitMsgDelta &msg ) const {
4583 int bindInfo;
4584
4585 if ( bindMaster ) {
4586 bindInfo = bindMaster->entityNumber;
4587 bindInfo |= ( fl.bindOrientated & 1 ) << GENTITYNUM_BITS;
4588 if ( bindJoint != INVALID_JOINT ) {
4589 bindInfo |= 1 << ( GENTITYNUM_BITS + 1 );
4590 bindInfo |= bindJoint << ( 3 + GENTITYNUM_BITS );
4591 } else if ( bindBody != -1 ) {
4592 bindInfo |= 2 << ( GENTITYNUM_BITS + 1 );
4593 bindInfo |= bindBody << ( 3 + GENTITYNUM_BITS );
4594 }
4595 } else {
4596 bindInfo = ENTITYNUM_NONE;
4597 }
4598 msg.WriteBits( bindInfo, GENTITYNUM_BITS + 3 + 9 );
4599}
4600
4601/*
4602================
4603idEntity::ReadBindFromSnapshot
4604================
4605*/
4606void idEntity::ReadBindFromSnapshot( const idBitMsgDelta &msg ) {
4607 int bindInfo, bindEntityNum, bindPos;
4608 bool bindOrientated;
4609 idEntity *master;
4610
4611 bindInfo = msg.ReadBits( GENTITYNUM_BITS + 3 + 9 );
4612 bindEntityNum = bindInfo & ( ( 1 << GENTITYNUM_BITS ) - 1 );
4613
4614 if ( bindEntityNum != ENTITYNUM_NONE ) {
4615 master = gameLocal.entities[ bindEntityNum ];
4616
4617 bindOrientated = ( bindInfo >> GENTITYNUM_BITS ) & 1;
4618 bindPos = ( bindInfo >> ( GENTITYNUM_BITS + 3 ) );
4619 switch( ( bindInfo >> ( GENTITYNUM_BITS + 1 ) ) & 3 ) {
4620 case 1: {
4621 BindToJoint( master, (jointHandle_t) bindPos, bindOrientated );
4622 break;
4623 }
4624 case 2: {
4625 BindToBody( master, bindPos, bindOrientated );
4626 break;
4627 }
4628 default: {
4629 Bind( master, bindOrientated );
4630 break;
4631 }
4632 }
4633 } else if ( bindMaster ) {
4634 Unbind();
4635 }
4636}
4637
4638/*
4639================
4640idEntity::WriteColorToSnapshot
4641================
4642*/
4643void idEntity::WriteColorToSnapshot( idBitMsgDelta &msg ) const {
4644 idVec4 color;
4645
4646 color[0] = renderEntity.shaderParms[ SHADERPARM_RED ];
4647 color[1] = renderEntity.shaderParms[ SHADERPARM_GREEN ];
4648 color[2] = renderEntity.shaderParms[ SHADERPARM_BLUE ];
4649 color[3] = renderEntity.shaderParms[ SHADERPARM_ALPHA ];
4650 msg.WriteLong( PackColor( color ) );
4651}
4652
4653/*
4654================
4655idEntity::ReadColorFromSnapshot
4656================
4657*/
4658void idEntity::ReadColorFromSnapshot( const idBitMsgDelta &msg ) {
4659 idVec4 color;
4660
4661 UnpackColor( msg.ReadLong(), color );
4662 renderEntity.shaderParms[ SHADERPARM_RED ] = color[0];
4663 renderEntity.shaderParms[ SHADERPARM_GREEN ] = color[1];
4664 renderEntity.shaderParms[ SHADERPARM_BLUE ] = color[2];
4665 renderEntity.shaderParms[ SHADERPARM_ALPHA ] = color[3];
4666}

4714
4715/*
4716================
4717idEntity::ServerSendEvent
4718
4719 Saved events are also sent to any client that connects late so all clients
4720 always receive the events nomatter what time they join the game.
4721================
4722*/
4723void idEntity::ServerSendEvent( int eventId, const idBitMsg *msg, bool saveEvent, int excludeClient ) const {
4724 idBitMsg outMsg;
4725 byte msgBuf[MAX_GAME_MESSAGE_SIZE];
4726
4727 if ( !gameLocal.isServer ) {
4728 return;
4729 }
4730
4731 // prevent dupe events caused by frame re-runs
4732 if ( !gameLocal.isNewFrame ) {
4733 return;
4734 }
4735
4736 outMsg.Init( msgBuf, sizeof( msgBuf ) );
4737 outMsg.BeginWriting();
4738 outMsg.WriteByte( GAME_RELIABLE_MESSAGE_EVENT );
4739 outMsg.WriteBits( gameLocal.GetSpawnId( this ), 32 );
4740 outMsg.WriteByte( eventId );
4741 outMsg.WriteLong( gameLocal.time );
4742 if ( msg ) {
4743 outMsg.WriteBits( msg->GetSize(), idMath::BitsForInteger( MAX_EVENT_PARAM_SIZE ) );
4744 outMsg.WriteData( msg->GetData(), msg->GetSize() );
4745 } else {
4746 outMsg.WriteBits( 0, idMath::BitsForInteger( MAX_EVENT_PARAM_SIZE ) );
4747 }
4748
4749 if ( excludeClient != -1 ) {
4750 networkSystem->ServerSendReliableMessageExcluding( excludeClient, outMsg );
4751 } else {
4752 networkSystem->ServerSendReliableMessage( -1, outMsg );
4753 }
4754
4755 if ( saveEvent ) {
4756 gameLocal.SaveEntityNetworkEvent( this, eventId, msg );
4757 }
4758}
4759
4760/*
4761================
4762idEntity::ClientSendEvent
4763================
4764*/
4765void idEntity::ClientSendEvent( int eventId, const idBitMsg *msg ) const {
4766 idBitMsg outMsg;
4767 byte msgBuf[MAX_GAME_MESSAGE_SIZE];
4768
4769 if ( !gameLocal.isClient ) {
4770 return;
4771 }
4772
4773 // prevent dupe events caused by frame re-runs
4774 if ( !gameLocal.isNewFrame ) {
4775 return;
4776 }
4777
4778 outMsg.Init( msgBuf, sizeof( msgBuf ) );
4779 outMsg.BeginWriting();
4780 outMsg.WriteByte( GAME_RELIABLE_MESSAGE_EVENT );
4781 outMsg.WriteBits( gameLocal.GetSpawnId( this ), 32 );
4782 outMsg.WriteByte( eventId );
4783 outMsg.WriteLong( gameLocal.time );
4784 if ( msg ) {
4785 outMsg.WriteBits( msg->GetSize(), idMath::BitsForInteger( MAX_EVENT_PARAM_SIZE ) );
4786 outMsg.WriteData( msg->GetData(), msg->GetSize() );
4787 } else {
4788 outMsg.WriteBits( 0, idMath::BitsForInteger( MAX_EVENT_PARAM_SIZE ) );
4789 }
4790
4791 networkSystem->ClientSendReliableMessage( outMsg );
4792}

4800 switch( event ) {
4801 case 0: {
4802 }
4803 default: {
4804 return false;

4809/*
4810================
4811idEntity::ClientReceiveEvent
4812================
4813*/
4814bool idEntity::ClientReceiveEvent( int event, int time, const idBitMsg &msg ) {
4815 int index;
4816 const idSoundShader *shader;
4817 s_channelType channel;
4818
4819 switch( event ) {
4820 case EVENT_STARTSOUNDSHADER: {
4821 // the sound stuff would early out
4822 assert( gameLocal.isNewFrame );
4823 if ( time < gameLocal.realClientTime - 1000 ) {
4824 // too old, skip it ( reliable messages don't need to be parsed in full )
4825 common->DPrintf( "ent 0x%x: start sound shader too old (%d ms)\n", entityNumber, gameLocal.realClientTime - time );
4826 return true;
4827 }
4828 index = gameLocal.ClientRemapDecl( DECL_SOUND, msg.ReadLong() );
4829 if ( index >= 0 && index < declManager->GetNumDecls( DECL_SOUND ) ) {
4830 shader = declManager->SoundByIndex( index, false );
4831 channel = (s_channelType)msg.ReadByte();
4832 StartSoundShader( shader, channel, 0, false, NULL );
4833 }
4834 return true;
4835 }
4836 case EVENT_STOPSOUNDSHADER: {
4837 // the sound stuff would early out
4838 assert( gameLocal.isNewFrame );
4839 channel = (s_channelType)msg.ReadByte();
4840 StopSound( channel, false );
4841 return true;
4842 }
4843 default: {
4844 return false;
4845 }
4846 }
4847 return false;
4848}

4959/*
4960================
4961idAnimatedEntity::UpdateAnimation
4962================
4963*/
4964void idAnimatedEntity::UpdateAnimation( void ) {
4965 // don't do animations if they're not enabled
4966 if ( !( thinkFlags & TH_ANIMATE ) ) {
4967 return;
4968 }
4969
4970 // is the model an MD5?
4971 if ( !animator.ModelHandle() ) {
4972 // no, so nothing to do
4973 return;
4974 }
4975
4976 // call any frame commands that have happened in the past frame
4977 if ( !fl.hidden ) {
4978 animator.ServiceAnims( gameLocal.previousTime, gameLocal.time );
4979 }
4980
4981 // if the model is animating then we have to update it
4982 if ( !animator.FrameHasChanged( gameLocal.time ) ) {
4983 // still fine the way it was
4984 return;
4985 }
4986
4987 // get the latest frame bounds
4988 animator.GetBounds( gameLocal.time, renderEntity.bounds );
4989 if ( renderEntity.bounds.IsCleared() && !fl.hidden ) {
4990 gameLocal.DPrintf( "%d: inside out bounds\n", gameLocal.time );
4991 }
4992
4993 // update the renderEntity
4994 UpdateVisuals();
4995
4996 // the animation is updated
4997 animator.ClearForceUpdate();
4998}

5014void idAnimatedEntity::SetModel( const char *modelname ) {
5015 FreeModelDef();
5016
5017 renderEntity.hModel = animator.SetModel( modelname );
5018 if ( !renderEntity.hModel ) {
5019 idEntity::SetModel( modelname );
5020 return;

5022

5024 renderEntity.customSkin = animator.ModelDef()->GetDefaultSkin();
5025 }
5026
5027 // set the callback to update the joints
5028 renderEntity.callback = idEntity::ModelCallback;
5029 animator.GetJoints( &renderEntity.numJoints, &renderEntity.joints );
5030 animator.GetBounds( gameLocal.time, renderEntity.bounds );
5031
5032 UpdateVisuals();
5033}

5049/*
5050==============
5051idAnimatedEntity::GetJointTransformForAnim
5052==============
5053*/
5054bool idAnimatedEntity::GetJointTransformForAnim( jointHandle_t jointHandle, int animNum, int frameTime, idVec3 &offset, idMat3 &axis ) const {
5055 const idAnim *anim;
5056 int numJoints;
5057 idJointMat *frame;
5058
5059 anim = animator.GetAnim( animNum );
5060 if ( !anim ) {
5061 assert( 0 );
5062 return false;
5063 }
5064
5065 numJoints = animator.NumJoints();
5066 if ( ( jointHandle < 0 ) || ( jointHandle >= numJoints ) ) {
5067 assert( 0 );
5068 return false;
5069 }
5070
5071 frame = ( idJointMat * )_alloca16( numJoints * sizeof( idJointMat ) );
5072 gameEdit->ANIM_CreateAnimFrame( animator.ModelHandle(), anim->MD5Anim( 0 ), renderEntity.numJoints, frame, frameTime, animator.ModelDef()->GetVisualOffset(), animator.RemoveOrigin() );
5073
5074 offset = frame[ jointHandle ].ToVec3();
5075 axis = frame[ jointHandle ].ToMat3();
5076
5077 return true;
5078}

5080/*
5081==============
5082idAnimatedEntity::AddDamageEffect
5083
5084 Dammage effects track the animating impact position, spitting out particles.
5085==============
5086*/
5087void idAnimatedEntity::AddDamageEffect( const trace_t &collision, const idVec3 &velocity, const char *damageDefName ) {
5088 jointHandle_t jointNum;
5089 idVec3 origin, dir, localDir, localOrigin, localNormal;
5090 idMat3 axis;
5091
5092 if ( !g_bloodEffects.GetBool() || renderEntity.joints == NULL ) {
5093 return;
5094 }
5095
5096 const idDeclEntityDef *def = gameLocal.FindEntityDef( damageDefName, false );
5097 if ( def == NULL ) {
5098 return;
5099 }
5100
5101 jointNum = CLIPMODEL_ID_TO_JOINT_HANDLE( collision.c.id );
5102 if ( jointNum == INVALID_JOINT ) {
5103 return;
5104 }
5105
5106 dir = velocity;
5107 dir.Normalize();
5108
5109 axis = renderEntity.joints[jointNum].ToMat3() * renderEntity.axis;
5110 origin = renderEntity.origin + renderEntity.joints[jointNum].ToVec3() * renderEntity.axis;
5111
5112 localOrigin = ( collision.c.point - origin ) * axis.Transpose();
5113 localNormal = collision.c.normal * axis.Transpose();
5114 localDir = dir * axis.Transpose();
5115
5116 AddLocalDamageEffect( jointNum, localOrigin, localNormal, localDir, def, collision.c.material );
5117
5118 if ( gameLocal.isServer ) {
5119 idBitMsg msg;
5120 byte msgBuf[MAX_EVENT_PARAM_SIZE];
5121
5122 msg.Init( msgBuf, sizeof( msgBuf ) );
5123 msg.BeginWriting();
5124 msg.WriteShort( (int)jointNum );
5125 msg.WriteFloat( localOrigin[0] );
5126 msg.WriteFloat( localOrigin[1] );
5127 msg.WriteFloat( localOrigin[2] );
5128 msg.WriteDir( localNormal, 24 );
5129 msg.WriteDir( localDir, 24 );
5130 msg.WriteLong( gameLocal.ServerRemapDecl( -1, DECL_ENTITYDEF, def->Index() ) );
5131 msg.WriteLong( gameLocal.ServerRemapDecl( -1, DECL_MATERIAL, collision.c.material->Index() ) );
5132 ServerSendEvent( EVENT_ADD_DAMAGE_EFFECT, &msg, false, -1 );
5133 }
5134}

5145/*
5146==============
5147idAnimatedEntity::AddLocalDamageEffect
5148==============
5149*/
5150void idAnimatedEntity::AddLocalDamageEffect( jointHandle_t jointNum, const idVec3 &localOrigin, const idVec3 &localNormal, const idVec3 &localDir, const idDeclEntityDef *def, const idMaterial *collisionMaterial ) {
5151 const char *sound, *splat, *decal, *bleed, *key;
5152 damageEffect_t *de;
5153 idVec3 origin, dir;
5154 idMat3 axis;
5155
5156 axis = renderEntity.joints[jointNum].ToMat3() * renderEntity.axis;
5157 origin = renderEntity.origin + renderEntity.joints[jointNum].ToVec3() * renderEntity.axis;
5158
5159 origin = origin + localOrigin * axis;
5160 dir = localDir * axis;
5161
5162 int type = collisionMaterial->GetSurfaceType();
5163 if ( type == SURFTYPE_NONE ) {
5164 type = GetDefaultSurfaceType();
5165 }
5166
5167 const char *materialType = gameLocal.sufaceTypeNames[ type ];
5168
5169 // start impact sound based on material type
5170 key = va( "snd_%s", materialType );
5171 sound = spawnArgs.GetString( key );
5172 if ( *sound == '\0' ) {
5173 sound = def->dict.GetString( key );
5174 }
5175 if ( *sound != '\0' ) {
5176 StartSoundShader( declManager->FindSound( sound ), SND_CHANNEL_BODY, 0, false, NULL );
5177 }
5178
5179 // blood splats are thrown onto nearby surfaces
5180 key = va( "mtr_splat_%s", materialType );
5181 splat = spawnArgs.RandomPrefix( key, gameLocal.random );
5182 if ( *splat == '\0' ) {
5183 splat = def->dict.RandomPrefix( key, gameLocal.random );
5184 }
5185 if ( *splat != '\0' ) {
5186 gameLocal.BloodSplat( origin, dir, 64.0f, splat );
5187 }
5188
5189 // can't see wounds on the player model in single player mode
5190 if ( !( IsType( idPlayer::Type ) && !gameLocal.isMultiplayer ) ) {
5191 // place a wound overlay on the model
5192 key = va( "mtr_wound_%s", materialType );
5193 decal = spawnArgs.RandomPrefix( key, gameLocal.random );
5194 if ( *decal == '\0' ) {
5195 decal = def->dict.RandomPrefix( key, gameLocal.random );
5196 }
5197 if ( *decal != '\0' ) {
5198 ProjectOverlay( origin, dir, 20.0f, decal );
5199 }
5200 }
5201
5202 // a blood spurting wound is added
5203 key = va( "smoke_wound_%s", materialType );
5204 bleed = spawnArgs.GetString( key );
5205 if ( *bleed == '\0' ) {
5206 bleed = def->dict.GetString( key );
5207 }
5208 if ( *bleed != '\0' ) {
5209 de = new damageEffect_t;
5210 de->next = this->damageEffects;
5211 this->damageEffects = de;
5212
5213 de->jointNum = jointNum;
5214 de->localOrigin = localOrigin;
5215 de->localNormal = localNormal;
5216 de->type = static_cast<const idDeclParticle *>( declManager->FindType( DECL_PARTICLE, bleed ) );
5217 de->time = gameLocal.time;
5218 }
5219}
5220
5221/*
5222==============
5223idAnimatedEntity::UpdateDamageEffects
5224==============
5225*/
5226void idAnimatedEntity::UpdateDamageEffects( void ) {
5227 damageEffect_t *de, **prev;
5228
5229 // free any that have timed out
5230 prev = &this->damageEffects;
5231 while ( *prev ) {
5232 de = *prev;
5233 if ( de->time == 0 ) { // FIXME:SMOKE
5234 *prev = de->next;
5235 delete de;
5236 } else {
5237 prev = &de->next;
5238 }
5239 }
5240
5241 if ( !g_bloodEffects.GetBool() ) {
5242 return;
5243 }
5244
5245 // emit a particle for each bleeding wound
5246 for ( de = this->damageEffects; de; de = de->next ) {
5247 idVec3 origin, start;
5248 idMat3 axis;
5249
5250 animator.GetJointTransform( de->jointNum, gameLocal.time, origin, axis );
5251 axis *= renderEntity.axis;
5252 origin = renderEntity.origin + origin * renderEntity.axis;
5253 start = origin + de->localOrigin * axis;
5254 if ( !gameLocal.smokeParticles->EmitSmoke( de->type, de->time, gameLocal.random.CRandomFloat(), start, axis ) ) {
5255 de->time = 0;
5256 }
5257 }
5258}
5259
5260/*
5261================
5262idAnimatedEntity::ClientReceiveEvent
5263================
5264*/
5265bool idAnimatedEntity::ClientReceiveEvent( int event, int time, const idBitMsg &msg ) {
5266 int damageDefIndex;
5267 int materialIndex;
5268 jointHandle_t jointNum;
5269 idVec3 localOrigin, localNormal, localDir;
5270
5271 switch( event ) {
5272 case EVENT_ADD_DAMAGE_EFFECT: {
5273 jointNum = (jointHandle_t) msg.ReadShort();
5274 localOrigin[0] = msg.ReadFloat();
5275 localOrigin[1] = msg.ReadFloat();
5276 localOrigin[2] = msg.ReadFloat();
5277 localNormal = msg.ReadDir( 24 );
5278 localDir = msg.ReadDir( 24 );
5279 damageDefIndex = gameLocal.ClientRemapDecl( DECL_ENTITYDEF, msg.ReadLong() );
5280 materialIndex = gameLocal.ClientRemapDecl( DECL_MATERIAL, msg.ReadLong() );
5281 const idDeclEntityDef *damageDef = static_cast<const idDeclEntityDef *>( declManager->DeclByIndex( DECL_ENTITYDEF, damageDefIndex ) );
5282 const idMaterial *collisionMaterial = static_cast<const idMaterial *>( declManager->DeclByIndex( DECL_MATERIAL, materialIndex ) );
5283 AddLocalDamageEffect( jointNum, localOrigin, localNormal, localDir, damageDef, collisionMaterial );
5284 return true;
5285 }
5286 default: {
5287 return idEntity::ClientReceiveEvent( event, time, msg );
5288 }
5289 }
5290 return false;
5291}
